SWZ_r-We_Dhwaxt6_ybAeQ.text: Delicious and unique! Their selection of both coffee and waffles is nothing I have ever seen before. I love that. We got the Snickers Iced Coffee and Twilight Lavender Latte. Snickers Iced Coffee is smooth and tasty with chocolate and caramel. My husband's latte was out of this world. Never would I have thought Lavender in a coffee would taste so amazing. It's a subtle end note that really makes the drink shine. Our Maple Bacon and Strawberry Kisses Waffles were perfectly crisp. The toppings were just enough to add some except flavors, but didn't over power the delicious taste of the waffles themselves. Overall, very impressed! Go check this place out!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry Kisses Waffle and Maple Bacon Waffle

07fEfX8EHiIs6QyOmj68Rw.text: I came in to tiabi today and wasnt sure what to expect considering the last time i was here i wasnt a coffee fan... but i checked in got 10 percent off got a iced coffee with hazelnut and almond milk and a bananatella waffle which im telling you guys rocked my world... BEST WAFFLE EVER!  i will be back cause that waffle will be in my dreams lol do yourself a favor and come in!

hMxqCyDh3hu9o0Zng_CXKA.text: Really cute place with friendly people. I got the waffle grilled cheese with avocado and it was really good! Will go back when I'm in vegas again!

tV3kj-7GpIwHuJbb3syqVw.text: Great coffee that isn't SB in Las Vegas!  (On another note I'm surprised Stumptown isn't that available around here...) The service was great too, I especially like how most everything can be made vegan. I'll have to try the vegan waffles next time... they look yummy. Oh yeah, Pearl Jam in the background is a nice touch too:)

DwPEhprCcFMqAbEqmowhDw.text: Tried out a red velvet waffle with a couple toppings and a latte.  Taste was excellent, latte luke warm but very good.  Will return soon for sure!

JFKnjPHKc6O-yp5Qjwr6Sw.text: Great coffee and food. Accommodate to vegan options. Good music and not too loud!!! Great employees make you feel welcome. Great vegan coffee options

HDyv9GftbkKBboL2kEA3SQ.text: Tiabi is amazing!!! The food is fantastic and the staff is always, ALWAYS on point and super friendly. I eat vegan/gf and Tiabi knows how to make fantastic eats for people like me too!! I love stopping there for myself, or for out of town friends. It's a hidden gem in Vegas. The vibe there is relaxed and chill, so stop in and enjoy!!!

YVvRLEJKwB5tNgYBoAl_Rg.text: Tiabi deserves to be in a category by itself:   6 stars.   This place is a rarity in American food.    The waffles are used to make a variety of sandwiches.   All of the ones I have tasted were superb.   They are carefully made and have REAL taste.   The potato chips are the best I have ever tasted.   The coffee is perfect.    I admire their ecological water station with real cups that are washed after each use and no ice.    With Big Agriculture producing more and more food with GMOs and no taste or flavor; with the fast food mega-chains offering caloric junk, cutting corners and showing no concern for their customers' health; and with American grocery stores stuffed with packaged products chock full with corn syrup or sweeteners, it is an earnest deed Tiabi does by offering flavorful real food.

IP4zM1tHfpHwNfrH2Ue1gw.text: I like it. My friend got me the hashtag breakfast sandwich and I like it! I can't speak much for their service but my friend said she had to wait a awhile for the food and her waffle was too crispy and overdone. However I will come back to try their coffee and other tings

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waffle was lit.

GpOZ0kX-aGSVcF4MLeYy0w.text: Couldn't stop talking about these waffles on our road trip. Luckily our trip began and will end in Las Vegas, so we are going to get some more waffles before we fly out! My brother loved the maple bacon waffle and I like the waffle sandwiches with turkey sausage. Note to owners: One waffle is not enough....The waffles are so good, they should be sold in pairs. Coffee is good also. It's nice to be able to get good coffee and breakfast in the same place! Staff is very friendly as well. It's located near Target if you need RT supplies, so a great place to have breakfast to begin your road trip!!

U2EPDRe3aavn94ulj1Wowg.text: This review is long overdue! I've been coming to Tiabi since it first opened and it never disappoints! When I'm in the mood for something tasty the vegan wafflewich is always my go to. I love the veggies, their sauce, and the daiya cheese and their house-made chips on the side... it's the perfect combo! When I'm in the mood for something sweet I always go for the Tiff's waffle macchiato. It comes with a slice of their churro waffle which is perfect to enjoy with your hot or cold macchiato. The food is great and the staff is friendly, especially Tiffany, one of the owners of Tiabi. There's nothing more you could ask for.

emPwfqwgg7qDFlfRha8Xsw.text: We almost drove off... It looked closed. Glad we checked further... Came for the gluten free waffles and they did not disappoint! Boyfriend had 2 golden and he said there were great! That's saying volumes for this guy... He's not a foodie and rarely raves on food or comments much. My son loved his gluten free waffle and we needed up ordering another to go! I got the Viva LA Elvis  gluten free... Pretty sure Elvis would have wanted more bacon  it was a fantastic waffle otherwise. When I went up to order my son's to go I also got a Chicken Thai Basil to go... I they way back to Phoenix now and eating the wrap in a gluten free waffle and it's freaking Heavenly!! Fantastic service my the two wishing this morning. We will be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten free chicken Thai Basil wrap!!! Auhmazing!!! Now I wish I&#39;d gotten 2!!
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten free Viva LA Elvis

y_68I2pUftRTCEwB7UrWxQ.text: My friend and I have been traveling together quite a bit over the past few weeks, and she is dairy free and gluten free. It's always so hard to find fun treats for her. Even bakeries often sell out of their GF options or simply don't have them in stock when we arrive. When we read that TIABI had vegan, gluten free waffles, we hurried over from our hotel. She loved her GF waffle with strawberries, and I enjoyed my bananatella. I also liked the honey cream latte. They have lots of fun coffee drinks. It was hard to choose one.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Banana Tella
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten free waffle

Bpj2Glia-OSfbXwsHiBlSQ.text: Dirty tables and floors at 8:00am with only two tables occupied. Nothing special about anything on the menu; we ordered two sandwiches. The breakfast sandwich comes with the thin microwave bacon and is standard. Not a fan of the Snickers iced coffee.   This place just isn't for me.

PfuJokwePyaXiAkdwMcHog.text: Pro: Good food, service was fine, clean place Cons: Expensive especially for the quantity  Vegan Viva la Elvis was good but bacon coconut is something I'll never eat again  Churro waffles with choco chips and drizzle was good.   Spent $22 (2 waffles + blended drink) and left hungry.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Viva la Elvis
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Churro waffles with Choco chips and drizzle

hJaWmnzgi4Fe5uU4QN022A.text: Great place to come especially if you're a student at Unlv!! Awesome and fast service! First timer and Ashley made my Strawberry Kisses Waffle and it was bomb! My mom got a green kale smoothie and it was really good! Check this place out !!(:

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

i6WwqnAYKf0nPsoV9_iJ-g.text: Absolutely love this place.  It's out of the way for me, but when I'm really in the mood for some tasty waffle sandwiches and delicious coffee, I come here and drag my bf with me lol.  Their west coast waffle sandwich is really good. I've been tempted to try their Thai Basil sandwich, but I get nervous taking a risk because what I usually tend to get hasn't disappoint so why should I stray away from what I'm used to and already enjoy? Lol  Maybe someday when I build up the courage.  Their coconut coffee was so delicious as well. Not too sweet and not too strong. Just my cup of "tea"   Service is nice too. Overall a good experience every single time.

6ucdrxlHsoHzO7KbGY42Dg.text: I have grown to really love this place. So glad it has remained a presence in this area. The coffee is top notch and I finally ventured around their menu and ate a savory sandwich. The Thai inspired waffle was great! The staff is pleasant, the environment is inviting and comfortable, and there is plenty of seating. Worth a visit for a lavender latte and a bite of some sort :)

XiZKS_8-A6iioZdYf0e8vQ.text: Great little breakfast or lunch spot. The West Coast waffle sandwich is the reason I come to this place. I also like the smoothies but you can't find waffle sandwiches in a ton of places so if you're gonna come here I say grab one. Off the strip a ways so don't plan on walking. I'll definitely keep coming to this place.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

O5wuvd0iNnKC3sDhjq0CLw.text: Really good waffles with unique flavors.  I had a red velvet cake waffle and my wife had the churro waffle.  Both were really good, and something different than your usual waffle.  The syrup they had was good as well.  Prices were decent, though you will probably want at least two waffles if you want to fill up.  Service was fine, food came out fast and the place was clean.  Nice place to eat off the strip.

R2QMOmKw1IAqlTxqP6gduw.text: Our first time here as my wife and I were heading home to Los Angeles.   Found them on Yelp. Service is top notch.  I asked a gentleman who seemed to be a local if he had been here before and if he had what was good. His reply. I've eaten here a lot. He recommended everything. Claimed he never had anything not good. So I ordered the Viva Las Vegas. An omage Elvis Presley. My wife ordered the Bannananutella. Both were soo goood. Love it.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Banananuetelle
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Viva Las Vegas is an omage to Elvis Presley.

tLnwanC2eHS4FpeFU0JqEA.text: Breakfast on the Vegas strip is either a choice of buffet, or an overpriced restaurant with Denny's style food. My husband and I are both big fans of hole-in-the-wall places, so when we came across Tiabi on Yelp, we had to try it. It is a bit of a drive off the strip, maybe 10 minutes. But it is SO WORTH IT! This place is a GEM. Every time we are in Vegas, which is 2-3 times a year, we go to Tiabi every day. And pro-tip - this place is VEGAN! I'm a meat eater, but it's worth mentioning!   I've probably tried every waffle on the menu, but the Elvis waffle is my absolute favorite. Peanut butter, bacon, honey, bananas...heaven. The last time we were there my husband told the waffle goddess to create a concoction of her choice and go nuts. She delivered.   And the COFFEE!!! The coconut truffle iced coffee is liquid of the gods. I've had the snickers one as well, but the coconut truffle has my heart. It's SO GOOD!!!   The vibe of the place is really cool. Very laid-back, and it's obvious the employees put a lot of love and pride into their food.  Do not pass this place up!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Viva Las Elvis
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry Kisses with banana added
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The amazing waffle the employee made when my husband said &#34;go nuts&#34;!

GjD_RQs6KckA_6whkdvwgw.text: One of the only spots in Vegas that prices fair & doesn't take advantage of it's customers. The food is yummy & the service is great, because of all this we will definitely come back.

7BaOXWNumO8SK8jpATzInA.text: Yummy waffles and great service the only thing was that our table was dirty so we switched table and it was the same. But the food was great and the drinks were refreshing.

YgXydbCqLy8WKYRrxa0gbg.text: I was a little skeptical at first because it's a kinda small on the inside for a breakfast spot. I also had to talk my friends into staying because they wanted to try something completely different. However, once the food came to the table all my skepticism departed. The food was surprising simple yet delicious. I definitely recommend either of the two items I tried and my friends were fairly satisfied with their choices as well.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. It wasn&#39;t my waffle so I don&#39;t know the name
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Guru Burger
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Guru Burger

PJ8tyy-q5KR9iBJMnNenow.text: Legit pulled espresso and a lovely little latte. My fella loved his pistachio latte. I had the v. coconut bacon waffle and he did the v. nutella. Both were off the chain!! Bonus points for being open early and not on the strip ;)

TSMDAnCA4TKRL43uyK7lQw.text: Who would have thought having waffles as a sandwich and enjoying it with a nice cup of joe would taste so amazing. This adorable place is a central hit to all things waffle, latte, and coffee. Whether you like your waffles savory or sweet, they have something great for everyone. They have a Waffledilla, Guru Burger, Savory Thai Basil, and if you prefer to stick to the Classic way of having your waffle, they do offer Bananatella, Strawberry Kisses, just to name a few. Also they have a waffle bar where you have that option to build it your way.   I ordered the West Coast Wafflewich ($6.75). This comes with tender chicken, Tiabi sauce, avocado, tomato, cheese, and I omitted bacon. The waffle is served crispy, the tender chicken taste like its seasoned and grilled, and I really like the flavor of the Tiabi sauce. As a side note, I can't even tell these waffles are vegan. All I can taste is how savory and delicious my wafflewich is and when I dip it with a side of syrup, it makes the meal even worth ordering for another one.   Now one of the most popular Signature Drink is Tiff's Waffle Macchiato ($4.55), which is a blend of cinnamon, vanilla, and macchiato topped with whipped cream and a churro waffle. I ordered this as a regular size hot drink with almond milk ($0.75) and requested a light whipped cream. This drink taste incredibly good! I never knew there is so much enjoyment eating a crunchy cinnamon flavored waffle churro and dipping that on a nice frothy cream. It's just so heavenly.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tiff&#39;s Waffle Macchiato
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. West Coast Wafflewich
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. West Coast Wafflewich Taste Amazing With Maple Syrup

LVCyqaS9rRPcGwSp3K_7dg.text: I love this place! The options are WOW. The food is bomb. I like the vibe, the people are normal and warm. They have gender neutral restrooms with funny signs.

lKwMqR39zbZGUXwVT84_7g.text: Easy to find parking.  In the same plaza as Target.  Clean facility!  Easy to find a place to sit down.  Menu is affordable averaging at $6.  I had the Vegan Wafflewich which was savory and tasty!  I also had the Banana Waffle!  The batter for the waffle is fresh and has a different taste to it.  Highly recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

djmZ1pRXPNhGQA9jKtZHPg.text: This place is super cute and serves good coffee/tea. They have some creative blends and menu items. I was pleasantly surprised to see the waffles were vegan and that they were catering to vegans. I got the honey latte with almond milk and the vegan Thai waffle. The honey latte was great and the Thai waffle was definitely a weird sounding combination but it was good as well. I definitely appreciate hidden gems like these and the staff definitely made an effort to make sure everything was right and that I was happy with what I ordered.

yHlXqHKG3wVQK4p-LAx-qQ.text: This place looks so nice and looks like Middle Eastern mixed with a very homely place. Everytime visit I always find ways to plan ahead for another visit

ku3gnu94Ff6nNKNLTbNEKA.text: I saw a groupon so I bought it & so glad I did! It sits in a plaza, parking was easy. I ordered the West Coast sandwich & a smoothie, the waffle bread exceeded my expectation, it had a little crunchy outside & when you took a bite it was soft and filled with lovely flavors, just the way I like a sandwich so deeeelish & the portion size is perfect! I will stop in here any time I'm in the area, even if not hungry, I'll take home for later. Can't wait to bring my family & friends here!

XcKCAmDTWggkdzmvu_eXJQ.text: Tiabi is a unique and extremely well executed concept See below for Pros and Cons  Pros From a very quirky minimalist design that makes the very industrial space feel like a cozy coffee shop.  The Coffee is very good, one of the 5 best coffee shops I've tried in Vegas and I try a new coffee shop almost every Saturday. The Waffle based food is delicious and unique The Staff is super friendly Meeting people in the social collision area of the shop makes meeting new people super easy!  Cons It's location is kind of hard to find. It doesn't have enough space to accommodate it's rush There is no bicycle parking  Overall, everything that Tiabi can control is really really well executed, the things beyond their control they've done a great job of mitigating.

IrXa8u9JDy5jxGaYFDR_Dg.text: After much procrastination, finally decided to check this place out. It was well worth the wait and is an amazing spot. The atmosphere and decor is absolutely amazing. A very relaxed but nice place to go and enjoy a waffle and coffee. The Recommendations given by one of the employees were perfect. Extremely friendly staff and very polite. The Java Jolt, and Tiff's Waffle Macchiato are very delicious. As well as the West Coast Wafflewich. The price is pretty decent for the quality. Definitley will be back again soon!

2l4nwgYfiXJRkDkQihNGig.text: Never had a waffle sandwich before. Exceeded expectations. Waffles were light and soft. Plenty of delicious looking options to keep us coming back

uweWoWvZRe2FqCGBtxTC6g.text: I thought this place was going to be a little different. I thought it was going to be more like a diner and not a cafe. I had a bacon and maple waffle and it was delicious. My two year old ate most of it. I also got the pistachio latte. Amazing!!!! The things I didn't like, there was only two people working so it took a long time to get our food. Each meal came out one at a time. My youngest fell asleep before his breakfast came. The other thing I didn't like was that they didn't have high chairs. That means that I can't bring my kids back. So I would say great food but not really as family friendly as I was expecting for a waffle place.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Matching cup. How cute. Kids milk and pistachio latte.
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon maple waffle.

nOJcJlXO3jS5iTNdqtFs7w.text: Decaf coffee flavorless. Was told that people don't know the taste of coffee that order decaf. Bacon was microwave, waffle thickness of toast. Two drinks and two waffles for over 20 bucks could have make better at home with my money. Guy at counter was super nice but he service wasn't enough to want to ever return.  The remark about the decaf coffee was made by the young lady who made the coffee. The flavor of your waffle was good. It was the quanity and quality of your other ingredients used that were not good especially for the price.

Dcgp_ao69FaLSAbHUATKlg.text: I had an amazing red velvet waffle with chocolate and whipped cream. The West Coast sand which was really nummy and filling. I enjoyed the little shop even though the area isn't located in the best part of Vegas. The coffee was tasty for a non speciality location. I would visit again next time I am in Vegas. Maybe try one of their dessert coffees or a vegan option.

fuhh4_DB-pKZg-TlVtVHVA.text: Just grubbed on their Bananatella waffles! Delicious!  Definitely worth ordering.  A delicious crispy homemade waffle with Nutella sprinkled across it and then topped off with bananas, chopped almonds and whipped cream.  Tastes just as good as it sounds!  Ordered it online and had it delivered and although the delivery took almost an hour (it was through Uber Eats though) it was still hot and fresh when we received it.  Will be dining in next time we go for breakfast, but definitely worth the order.

caiftFodOtcfLe-GuIXGrg.text: A quiet lovely place away from the noisy casinos for good waffles and coffee. Love my red velvet waffles with bananas and strawberries, drizzled with chocolate syrup. The wafflewiches were also delicious, although was not big enough portion for big eaters like us for lunch, more like a snack size. Didn't have a chance to try their smoothies. Will have to visit again.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

O0_x1LngBh9Xn1M-Zhnqvw.text: Awesome coffee shop with great drinks! Had the Red Velvet Latte and Pumpkin Pie Cream frappucino. The Red Velvet Latte exceeded my expectations and the Pumpkin Pie Cream Frappucino was good but not as good as the other drink. It was a little too thick for my liking and tasted more like a milkshake. It was still very good though. I'd come back here if I felt like getting something with coffee but don't want to go to a chain coffee shop.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Red velvet frappe
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Red velvet latte and pumpkin pie cream frappucino

Sh-jvLH3L787nihcYUGXNg.text: I know I'm in the minority but the food here is just ok. I actually left feeling sick to my stomach, this is just before heading to work so I'm not happy right now. I was beyond excited to try this place and went out of my way to come.   I had the west coast and the honey espresso coffee.  The girl at the counter was very nice and everything came out super fast... but it was not busy at the time. As soon as my sandwich/waffle was ready I dug right in but it was already soggy and just fell apart. Kinda disappointing but oh well, I managed with a fork and knife. The waffle was tasty on its own but together it did not jive with me.  Honey espresso was yummy, almost too sweet for my taste so likely wouldn't order again. But they have a lot to choose from.   If I come back I'm just gonna stick to traditional waffle with minimal extras on top to play it safe.

qt5Wp6-qEl3Erfcywk9S5g.text: Met a friend here very early on a Sunday morning for coffee.  The cashier was friendly and very helpful especially since it was our first time there.  She even made recommendations and provided excellent customer service.  I ordered an iced hazelnut coffee sweetened, but no cream and also a maple & bacon infused waffle.  The coffee and waffle were a hearty and delicious breakfast, which surprised me as they were very flavorful!  The place has a nice coffee shop vibe, music was good but not too loud, and it was the perfect spot to have a conversation.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Iced hazelnut coffee &amp; waffle
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Maple &amp; Bacon Waffle

VqbLS_HznZLMHG3he_dVdQ.text: We ordered the maple bacon waffle and the breakfast sandwich. The food was amazing!  The best waffles ever. I was so impressed. Great customer service and I didn't have to wait too long for my food. I wish there was a Tiabis is San Diego.

dlItlBYbD3a71c9o3QSAHg.text: This place is heaven. No, seriously, it is.  Where else can one find green smoothies and scrumptious waffles in ONE place?  So eat the darn waffle, and then repent by drinking blended kale. Yup, pretty much,  As we walked in, we were greeted by happy faces and the scent of warm, delicious waffles. I was very impressed by the selection of vegan goodies they offered. But luckily, im not vegan, so it was time to indulge with deliciousness. We ordered the Banana Tella waffle and sat down. They make the waffles fresh for each order so we had to wait a couple of minutes. When the waffles came out I had one regret: we had ordered one to share. And although one is actually pretty big, this is the kind of dish that should never be shared with a lived one. Its seriously good enough to break friendships and end marriages. Luckily for my husband, I had a big lunch before it, so it  wasnt so bad (the sharing, that is).  If you like waffles, GO. If you like smoothies, GO. If you like coffee, GO.  Just go. Seriously. And order the banana tella. You are welcome.

KYz3v7OKC6UhaVCixA0KFQ.text: This place had delicious food, tasty coffee and a cool vibe. The people working there were friendly and helpful. It was my first visit and I am glad I found it. It's a local gem and I will be frequenting this place often now! They suggested "The West Coast" sandwich for lunch and it was very tasty. I paired it with "Tiff's Waffle Macchiato" and a cool glass of ice water. I sat and read my book, ate my lunch and enjoyed the chill atmosphere and my tasty food/beverage. Thanks guys and gals for a great experience.

moaOcPyA9Uiy0eVjQaQ6Mw.text: I really wish this place was close to me, as their vegan waffle selection and flavors are great!  Came here on the way to the airport upon leaving vacation, and it definitely did not disappoint. I had the viva las elvis vegan style, and an avocado smoothie, and my dining partner had one of their waffle breakfast sandwich concoctions.   my waffle was very tasty. I wish I were eating one right now instead of writing this review. The smoothie was pretty good, probably wish I would've went with another smoothie as avocado smoothies are hit and miss to me (despite loving avocados).   My dining partner still mentions how delicious her sandwich was and that she wished the place was closer, so there is that too! all and all, great all around!.

3j3FJFA9ceSfzS9p1-V_Ag.text: Interesting wake concoctions, such as the red velvet waffle or the maple bacon waffle. However, very dry, they were too crispy for my tastes, but they were cheap...so...ehhh

8CKphbusoF71cuUGen0B3Q.text: The coffee was the best part of my meal! My husband and I both got waffle sandwiches and the waffle itself was thin which is perfect and tasty but I had one with chicken and the chicken tasted like that pre-packed stuff. Got the coffee with the cinnamon waffle on top and the waffle was awesome on that so I would go back just for sweet waffles and coffee.

bvdMkNPUZUP1WpdrQ4SZ7g.text: Well, it's lunch time again at the office. Joe came in my office and asked if I wanted waffles for lunch, I was like that seems odd, but Joe is a standup guy so I trusted him, and I was down for an adventure after my extremely boring day so far. So we loaded up a couple cars or coworkers and we rolled on over. The inside of the place was cool, actually it was a little cold. I liked the painting of princess leia and Vader. They have a waffle sandwich named the West coast, which is what I got, mainly because I like to say "West Coast" in my white "Gangsta" accent. They have Mexican coke in "medio litro" sizes, that was good. Exp date on it was august of 2017, so that gives it plenty of time. I liked the music, it was like a funky sax beat that got my jiggy flowing. Jami got the Guru Burger, she said "it's delicious" Joe said his waffle was "primo" he got the strawberry kisses or something. "The kettle chips are delicious" - Jami. Alex said the Guru burger was "good so far" Jamie said the Strawberry kisses was "really good!" Byoungha said about the WestCoast "it's good....real good" In addition they had playing cards at our table, me Jordan, Alex, and  Sarah played "go fish", Jordan won with 8 matches.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5k0V0DtMiVXIodPc0uPuww.text: The waffles are very crispy and good! I got the lavender drink and also the peach drink but neither was very good. Both felt like there was something missing. The vibe of the place wasn't there; and it wouldn't be somewhere I'd sit and enjoy eating at. Especially since they are going for a cafe type place. The customer service was subpar as well. It took the person 5 minuets to actually acknowledge us even though we were the only people there.

XCmsx1UilLDhKOIzFBLhWQ.text: Delicious waffles. I always go for the guru burger, a vegan waffle sandwich. Friendly service, cool hang out spot. Did I mention their waffles are delicious?

l2-vire8iYLksnnr94FIKg.text: Service: Quick, friendly, and helpful.   Our banana berry came out within a few minutes of ordering ($5.25). The smoothie wasn't icy at all and you could actually taste all the ingredients they put into the drink, unlike most places. IMO, $5.25 is a lot for a smoothie, but I would say it was well worth it's price.  I also ordered the west coast ($5.99). I was torn between the steak and egg waffle (a new addition to the menu) vs the west coast. I went with the west coast since the person at the register suggested it and I'm glad I did.  The west coast was the perfect balance of sweet and salty. The avocado didn't over power the sandwich which I feel most sandwiches do. It was definitely enough to make me full since I also ordered a side of house chips. The house chips tasted like kettle cooked mesquite bbq chips, but they season it themselves kinda like potato corner. Would recommend. We have a place like this in Cali called Bruxie's, but I'd rather come here because their items are more flavorful.   P.S. They play a variety of girl power songs from Ciara, Beyonce, Nicki Minaj, Destiny's Child, etc... lol

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. banana berry
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. westcoast
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. west coast

4HMM6diMIefJ5eOOfB2Zww.text: Hit the spot in so many ways. Never thought of having a waffle quesadilla but it makes sense now. Lots of options and flavors. Good spot for a group of indecisive hungry people. I'll have to stop by here again.

xLcq-KNxQjDoYoIuWKbMjw.text: This place is actually a great place to study while enjoying something to eat. The food was pretty good for the price. The menu had a variety of choices which made it difficult to choose from, but the choices all seemed fairly delicious. If none of the items on the men seem appealing to you, they do have build-your-own waffles and wafflewiches. I do recommend checking out Groupon as well for other deals that are offered here. Spend more, eat more, be happy! 10/10 highly recommend.

Gg6RQJkQ9lxOBMI9Krq9TQ.text: My first time trying a pistachio latte which did not disappoint. Tiabi is a nice cafe with great food options. The interior could use a little sprucing up as I wouldn't want to spend my day here to work/study, but if you're in the area and looking for good coffee and food this is a great option.

ov5iVTuF_HdbsrBExGaWOw.text: I've had a waffle sandwich!  Bucket list item completed.  The West Coast Wafflewich was excellent.  Great combination of chicken, bacon and avocado.  Nice coffee selection as well.  Tiabi is a nice spot for breakfast, lunch, dinner or anywhere in between.  Fast Wifi connection too.  Sign me up.

WgiRr8_wGG_K5rQEdLgmmg.text: This place and their team is spectacular! We had a large event here with 20 guests. Everyone was accommodating, the food was phenomenal, and there were was quite a variety for us to choose from.   I had a hot waffle macchiato and the waffle breakfast sandwich with turkey sausage and veggies. On my way out, I got a coconut cooler, which was a totally refreshing and unique cold drink that didn't make it all the way home with me. :) Definitely give this place a shot!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Geek Girl Brunch Las Vegas at Tiabi on 5/27

bSkX_Qip04ZvCNV8n5WarQ.text: I woke up deathly hungry and happened to be nearby Tiabi. I had it bookmarked for a while just was never in the area to try it out for breakfast. IM SO GLAD THAT I STOPPED BY! I ordered the Bacon Breakfast sandwich and it was delicious! (Would highly recommend) Can't wait to come back and try some of the other options. Side note: Very Cozy & relaxing atmosphere!

_cp-a2zTAfvJnCOe5EA62g.text: Waffle me, please.   Once your senses are completely overwhelmed from casino dwelling on the LV Strip, head over to Tiabi for something a bit more down to Earth: smoothies, coffee and waffles.   It sounds a lot more decadent than it really is: an honest to goodness cafe. No gimmick, no half naked servers, no gaudy decor or slots. Plain and simple good eats, drinks, wifi and everyday people.  Tiabi opens early, around 6:30 am on weekdays. Which is good because I arrived around 7:45, parched and hungry. Strawberry banana smoothie took the edge off for a few hours, then the West Coast waffle sando took care of the rest.   A few hours of normal does a body good. I headed back to my hotel feeling recharged and ready to take on the Strip again.

MkDz_0HNpcFVpFWAj-f1PQ.text: Very good! I got the bananatella waffle it taste Soo good. My boyfriend got the vegan veggie burger and it was decently good to for someone who doesn't like vegan food at all.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8rKGdVh5TtZi0bNtivWXiw.text: This is by far my wife and my favorite place to visit since we have moved to Las Vegas. Every item on the menu has been delicious and we will continue to go back. We love stopping by for the Tiff's coffee waffle macchiato.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

WMWyZ-8W5ctuNrUxQrDoLA.text: Partly of my weekly routine is to treat myself to a coffee and waffle at TIABI. Today I went with the golden waffle (bananas and strawberries) and a red velvet coffee. It was amazing !  The place has it all, great food, great tunes playing to ensure a mellow ambiance and comics/art. Plus you can't beat the service. Everyone is super friendly. If you are lucky Jay will arrange your toppings to look like a flower. Give a shout out to Courtney, Yanel, Vanessa, Simon, John, and Claris.

4Wur7g1cfR4hj758Op7UAA.text: Oh my goodness!! I can not say enough good things about this little gem in the desert. Food was excellent. I had the West Coast a waffle sandwich with chicken bacon and avocado yummy!! And my daughter had the southern pecan waffle. The drinks were so good too my daughter had the twilight   lavender coffee tea, which I thought I would not like but actually loved!! And I had the coconut cooler with basil so incredibly good. Love this little place. Definitely worth it!!

BZce19DQtqG4NeeCxKgd9w.text: We stopped by early in the morning on our way to the Grand Canyon, and the restaurant wasn't too busy. At the front desk, they displayed some of their deails, like 10% off for checking in on Yelp, and buy-one-get-one-free on their classic waffles.  The place itself was a good-size hipster cafe, and the employees were all very friendly. The only complaint I had was that the service took unusually long. Our smoothies and coffees came out relatively fast, but for the three waffles we ordered, we waited about 25 minutes. Luckily, they had a few deck of cards that you can play with to pass the time.  Aside from the wait, the food was really delicious. They had a good selection of waffle dishes, and there were a couple substitions that they make to cater to vegans. Overall, definitely recommend this place if you're looking for waffles.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry Kisses - fresh strawberries, chocolate drizzle, and whipped cream
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Maple Bacon - bacon strips cooked inside a hot waffle, powered sugar, and whipped butter
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Viva Las Elvis (vegan) - bananas, peanut butter, TIABI made coconut bacon, and agave drizzle

b30rkTopa_ae-sDExO_lbA.text: One of my favorite coffee spots here in Las Vegas. Wonderful breakfast sandwiches, waffles, at that waffle Macchiato is unbelievably good

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waffle Macchiato- highly recommend!

KhBKVsEe8_I6_unXUbEs_A.text: In town for the weekend and need a quick breakfast joint. Tiabi is the place to go! The customer service is wonderful and super friendly. Not only that but they're vegan waffles so I can't complain! Especially since my boyfriend is super picky on what vegan food he will eat with me since he's not vegan but he loves it here! They have great smoothies and a awesome choice of waffles. But definitely let them know you're vegan maybe tell them twice because I told them I was vegan and they made my waffle completely not vegan so I had to order something else and by the time I got it my boyfriend was already finished and ready to leave. :/ The Viva La Vegas is super filling and yummy. The waffles also feel very light and not heavy in your stomach! Defiantly check it out if your in town!

txIwt8dSl1o9Zk2gozaudw.text: Really amazing service and food. Ordered the guru burger last time I was here and it was one of my favorite vegan burgers ever !

Z8yDG08FGb3Z__YfdOUimg.text: This is probably my favorite breakfast place for when I have a sweet tooth. The establishment seems very clean and has a mixed modern but slightly rustic feel to it. It has plenty of seating and I find that even if it's full, it's never too loud. The food is always great! I usually get the bananutella with a churro waffle and ice cream (a 10 year olds dream breakfast). The coffee is also exceptional. I find that for the price, this is the best of the best if you want a quality waffle meal in a quality waffle place.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LmXioi6qWf3czEdtkhnbGA.text: AMAZING!! Their waffle sandwiches are so so good, and their prices are definitely affordable. I had a Waffledilla wafflewich. The Tiabi sauce is so good. It honestly didn't look like much when I got it, but the delicious taste will pleasantly surprise you. My parents got the West Coast wafflewich and the Savory Thai Basil wafflewich. Both of them loved it! I also got an iced Twilight Lavender Latte, which tastes like a lavender white mocha. It's on the sweeter side, so I personally LOVED it. However, if Starbucks type coffee drinks are not your thing, perhaps that's not the drink for you. ABOVE ALL, even if this place is a little out of the way from where you live, I still think it is definitely worth a try!!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Twilight Lavender Latte!!
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waffledilla wafflewich

pIzTMnru-7rDUInGfCUzgQ.text: Delicious and fresh!!! Totally recommend! Friendly staff!! Will moat definitely be back!

HLdcJxhlAAO5jHIdEZp1sA.text: The coffee wasn't that bad! Order the bananatella, was alright, but the guy that was taking our order was really rude, the best part of coffee shops is the costumer service, but in here they were rude to us.... not sure if I'm going back

PsJVxRZqFX2rgBgBacz-hg.text: Best waffles EVER! I had the Banannatella waffle and it was so crispy and yummy. I hate it when waffles get soggy. It wasn't way too sweet but a perfect happy medium. I also got a snickers cold coffee which was "okay" but the waffle was to die for! Great friendly fast service

BgAxktvo3acEvrHxYP19_A.text: Very impressed. Got a groupon which gave us 3 $8 vouchers for $14. My boyfriend used one on the western sandwich and I used one on the same thing and the waffle macchiato with an extra shot to drink coming out to $5 after. We were both very happy with the sandwiches which at $6 were reasonably priced and filling. They were not skimpy with the fillings and the food was quick and service friendly. I added the extra shot to the drink as I'm used to 3 shot large drinks and a previous review recommended it. The extra shot made it more of a balanced taste rather than overly sweet. The churro waffle on top was delicious as was the cinnamon vanilla drink below. I'll definitely be back.

Tad3_cKLsZmQIhrI_PQ-rw.text: Little shop in a strip mall. Coffee was delicious and waffles were even better. Thin crispy outside with soft center. I'm not a fan of Belgium style and was so please to find this spot! Can't wait to go back. Lots of options, sweet, savory and gluten free!

bW7mz6fsBh9VHkEW-iZ9ZA.text: These vegan waffles have been on my radar for a while and I'm glad I finally got to try it!   My bf & I came in on a Friday at about 8:30am and we were the only ones in the restaurant at this time so we were served right away. It's cafe type ordering so you just order and pay at the register and seat yourself.   Since it was our first time, I asked the girl which items were vegan and she told me the only one was "Viva Las Elvis" which had coconut bacon, peanut butter and agave syrup on top. I'm not a huge fan of PB but decided to give it a try since she said it was the only vegan option. Little did I know, after I ordered I saw on yelp reviews that they do offer vegan butter to top your waffles which sort of bothered me as to why she didn't give me the heads up on that since I could've technically ordered another "non vegan" waffle and just customized it to be vegan. I mean I did like my waffle but it wasn't the greatest and wished I had opted for the butter pecan waffles instead but maybe next time.   My bf absolutely loved the Guru Burger and couldn't be more satisfied! We liked the fact that the patty isn't made of soy and is made of superfood ingredients that make the burger so much more enjoyable. We also got a free "snickers" iced coffee with check in which was also pretty good.   Overall, we had a good first time experience. The staff was friendly, I love how big the cafe is and it's a perfect place to study for students especially since it's right by UNLV!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Viva Las Elvis Waffle
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Guru burger
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free iced coffee

mlIdXMKh7anSjvXNC-ucJA.text: Food was ok, not good enough to go back. We got two different kinds of specialty coffee and one of them was pretty bad. I told the manager i didn't care for it  and he asked me if I drank out of it. I said yes. He told me he can't give me a refund then. I asked how would I know I didn't like it if I didn't try it, and if I didn't drink it what would he do with it. He said he understands and he would save it or put it in the fridge till someone else ordered the same kind! So make sure your drinks are fresh when served and not just fresh whipped cream added on top. I think the health district needs to pay them a visit. So disappointed in the disgusting comment and horrible customer service.

Xuk5V60XJbn7v3-IIN-daA.text: Introduction: Always looking for a good coffee place. Came across Tiabi on Groupon and decided to try them out.  I must say, it was delicious.   Quality: 5/5 We had the snicker "iced coffee" and  the honey "I'm home waffle".  They were both equally good.  The coffee had the perfect sweetness and so was the waffle. However, if I must rate between the two, I enjoyed the waffle  slightly better.   Quantity: 4/5 For the price, I think it's good, but not great. Although the large coffee was plenty, I usually see that as a medium size. So fyi, in case you are considering a small. It's really good, so I recommend the large.  Customer Service: 4/5 Nothing spectacular, although there was only two parties in there including us, we were not acknowledged when we walked in like most places do with incredible customer experience.  However, they were good once we were assisted.  Atmosphere: 5/5 It was kind of cold in there, there were us and one other couple that was in the shop. Mainly because we went about 4:30 p.m. Coffee shops are not known to be busy during that hour.  The music volume was however perfect tone. Not too loud or too soft.   Cleanliness: 4/5 The place appeared a little older, but was clean and organize.  Price: 5/5 The price was good, however, we got Groupon promotions, so it made their pricing exceptional :)  Tips: You can get three $8 groupons for $14.25.  So we have two left to utilize. Will definitely be back to try out their other items.  Keep an eye out,  It's located in a plaza, so it's not a stand alone coffee shop. We almost missed it. Enjoy! You won't be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Honey, I&#39;m home waffle. Yummy!!!
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

UDsDXIJCHBE2-gtdZHrtMA.text: OMG!!! The best Waffles ever. Went here with my beautiful daughter and ordered the West Coast sandwich with house chips and a red velvet waffle with a 20 oz Coca-Cola and a 20 oz Dragonfruit Vitamin water.  First both waffles were cooked to perfection with a crisp crunchy texture and served warm fresh from the waffle iron.  The West Coast was loaded with chicken slices, bacon slices, avocado slices and tomato slices with Tiabi Sauce and cheese.   The house chips were very good with a awesome seasoning that was a little sweet and savory. I'm glad I ordered them and I would recommend that everyone must try it for themselves. You'll thank me later.  The Red Velvet Waffle was topped with of chocolate chips, hot fudge and whipped cream.   They have some great coffee drinks and other beverages to choose from.  There is free wifi and a roomy seating and study area and outlets to juice up your gadgets.  We will definitely be back for the best waffles that I have ever ate.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. West Coast
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Red velvet waffle
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yXKzwj1OaLuOrqqFug5B-A.text: Fantastic waffles! Even the gluten free option tastes great. The coffee is also really top notch. I'll be back here next time I'm in town.   Protip: they have real maple syrup, but you have to ask for it and pay a bit extra. Totally worth it.

C_tr9FQo2UCP2Z6oLuj4QA.text: This is one of my favorite breakfast/lunch places! It is conveniently located near UNLV so it's also a great place to go between classes. They have lots of options for vegans too so I definitely appreciate that. Delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

-Tzo1S3JBsh_jtYF1qEiZQ.text: Love coming here for their churro waffle! . Always put some sort of drizzle with whipped cream! . Incredible. And it's a good place to have breakfast with friends or significant other.  The food is always good. But I just can't get into their coffee. I've tried a few different ones and not a fan of any of them.

CMFRF-4n3TjgpeG51inOfA.text: Loved everything. We ordered a banana Nutella and an avocado grilled cheese waffle. We requested to go light on cheese and the cheese sandwich couldn't be any better. The waffles are vegan and they have other vegan options as well. The waffles are crispy and not overwhelmingly sweet. And cute decor is always a plus

On6XT9gTrLcyd9m4fxLocw.text: Great coffee and waffles. The staff is very laid back and help the environment really keep that relaxed vibe. I've tried almost every item on the menu and I have to say, there wasn't one thing that I didn't enjoy. This place is also great for locals and great location being so close to UNLV. I urge the students to try this place out. Pricing is fairly decent, I'd definitely say it's affordable especially on a student budget. In conclusion, highly recommended!

7HfRkgkvmBYFJZhm512-zg.text: Incredible brunch place, glad we chose this place. Great vegan options which incidentally did not compromise the taste. Excellent service, will be here when we're back in Vegas!

o09GjBbNP5rqqQUszV_hhQ.text: This is the only place where I can really enjoy the waffles, Great taste on anything you choose from the menu, small cosy place. We love It!

Pvfw4S1f4Ni1j8D0Gue_rw.text: This is located a few minutes away from UNLV. We came to study after class and check it out. The smell when you walk in... is dangerous. I can imagine it being something similar to heaven's scent. The music isn't too loud... it could be better but some of it was decent.   We were greeted at the counter by a very nice young man. He was knowledgeable and gave us great suggestions. They have a variety of vegan options in both coffee lattes and waffles. We chose the Java Jolt and the dark chocolate lavender latte both with almond milk. They were great and I would highly recommend. Both were priced like any other coffee house in Vegas, nothing outrageous and totally fair.   We ordered dessert to go... vegan the cinnamon churro waffle with vegan vanilla ice cream. It was so amazing. The ice cream was like nothing I've ever experienced. The waffle was made perfectly. We put it in the microwave to make it extra warm and soft, since we took it to go... and it was just so amazing. I can not wait to go back and get it again. If you've never been here, I definitely recommend giving it a try!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Churro waffle with vegan vanilla ice cream (vegan)

Eb5ABcSRQgolCXIUdJLUvg.text: Great coffee, waffle was outstanding.  A bit of a wait for everything, but worth it! I ordered the Tiff's waffle Macchiato and a butter pecan waffle.  My son ordered the West Coast and a Rebel Punch.  We both agreed we will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

iIWOdURhUQhR-48wemcOZA.text: Sam is always do nice and helpful. Super informative with any question I have and he proposed the CBD water to me which did help me when I was a little sick .... thanks Sam !

MGhucofhJqPESbJcTiOC8Q.text: Super cute shop, great menu variety, decent food, but SLOW AF.   Came here for what we thought was a fast breakfast option. Just to take our orders took a while. Ok, whatever. Got coffee orders quick, a good sign. Then we proceeded to wait like 45 minutes for our food to come out. How long does it take to toast a damn waffle and put some toppings or sandwich meat and eggs in the middle?   The service is friendly. The atmosphere for the restaurant is nice. It's laid-back and relaxed. Clean bathrooms are a plus. But perhaps the laid-backness is what caused the slow food.   We got the Green Nut (?) the super green smoothie, the breakfast sandwich plus sausage and bacon, and the western sandwich. The green smoothie tasted like what you'd expect of a green smoothie, I wouldn't really want to get it again cuz it wasn't much of a wow. The breakfast sandwich was tasty. Not too flavorful but I didn't mind it. The western was delicious and the highlight. The waffle was perfect.   3 stars because it doesn't deserve lower. But I don't think I'd come back based on how long it takes to get a WAFFLE.

SUq1_ZVtttWQqd_w9_q5ag.text: THIS PLACE. First, the waffles - slightly crunchy on the outside and soft and fluffy on the inside. Combine that with a wide assortment of their toppings and you're golden. Go for extra decadence with their drinks - boyfriend ordered their tiff macchiato (comes with 1/4 churro waffle!) and I ordered their tuxedo frappe, both of which were fantastic, if a little on the richer side. We are visiting Vegas only for a few days and so far we just haven't been able to have something other than Tiabi for breakfast. Kudos to the guy behind the counter, who was really friendly and made sure we enjoyed our stay!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Honey I&#39;m Home and smores (in the background)
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tiff macchiato and white tuxedo- the latter is pretty much a chocolate bomb. Both were rich and decadent
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan protein waffle with strawberry and blueberry :3 made with whole wheat - health(ish) and delicious!

0V9IdyGvDCbWFD5jopwbSA.text: One of the reasons I love living mid town! Had the west coast wafflewich, sooo good! Something about a fresh waffle folded around seasoned chicken breast, avocado, tomato, bacon, melted cheese, and with the signature Tiabi sauce. Do your taste buds a favor.

HNl3WTT8DLHZpz2wLVAkAg.text: Best Waffle House in Las Vegas! Incredible creations and unbelievable tasting waffles. I am so glad I came here for breakfast! Think I'll return for lunch with my daughter and try a waffle sandwich! And I must try the waffle macchiato which I regret not ordering after I saw one served up!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Best waffle house in town! Hidden gem off the strip is a must if you are in the mood for a great waffle.

gEDnWnZLAVn-HJygo3ozXA.text: Service is horrendous and wait time is ridiculous! AR order time, told it would be about 20 minutes,  ok. After waiting 30 minutes I got up and asked how much longer, surprise, they didn't put in my order. Girl next to me got wrong item and had to get a refund then refund wasn't right amount and had to go back to cashier to correct. People on other side of me were halfway through their meal and still hadn't received their drinks, they had to go ask for them.  Waffle itself was great tasting but insides were skimpy, like they just tossed a handful of items on it and sent it out since they knew they made a mistake. I never did receive my kettle chips. :-( bottom line is, don't bother.

AjIjgGraZdmMDnRpo_EyJg.text: Amazing! Once you enter it smells like waffles and I am in looove with the smell of waffles. I had the iced tea with hibiscus  definitely a refresher

ga_R1kywJ0bc_n3Xn0skhQ.text: Awesome vegan options and jay was knowledgeable and friendly. Will definitely be back!

_OUnbAuNSQMCXsKro6MMYw.text: Really rude service, drive 4 hours to Las Vegas and look for a sweet treat after a long trip, and they tell us "we're closing early so we can only make drinks to go." You might as well tell us "we don't feel like working; we wanna go home and enjoy our weekend even though you're paying for our paycheck. Really rude girl at the counter, said something about having to close early because it's slow day, but you can't stay open for 10more minutes ?? Keep in mind we got here at .7:30 and they're supposed to close at 8.

T8vR51alcSmfYk20cr33EQ.text: excellent idea. i went for breakfast with a friend and it was busy but quiet enough to be considered intimate. the coffee was not the best i've had but it was not bad. the presentation of my waffle was pretty good but i feel like they were a little scarce on the toppings.

QXF9eV4lBjuJazkqEDHKGQ.text: This has to be the best place to get waffles. They always come out perfect. I ordered through postmates and it still came perfect. Even the iced coffee. Usually when you order a drink through delivery it gets watered down by the ice but nope still great!

v31jPyCdueUwCd-MiTGOSQ.text: If you are a vegan in Vegas, this is the place for you! We came for lunch one day, and came back for breakfast the next. I had the Savory Thai and Guru vegan burgers. They come in a waffle instead of a bun, though you can ask for a bun if you prefer.  All the veges were fresh, and the sauce on the burgers was amazing! The waffles (also vegan) are crispy on the outside with a fluffy center, and slightly sweet. Probably the best waffles I've ever had, vegan or not.  The blendies (smoothies) were also yummy - I tried the strawberry sunrise and banana peanut butter. If you like PB, definitely get the PB blendie!

1MfzxWpmjJuF9b0BGb-gXA.text: This place makes me miss my vacation to Las Vegas so much....the food is beyond amazing and the pricing is reasonable.  The smoothies are absolutely delightful and has really gotten me to eat healthier by making me crave their smoothies all the time and finding the need to learn to make it myself in order to satisfy that craving.  The waffles are so good, both sweet and salty. However, I think I might be more hooked on the salty waffle sandwiches. Its a bit sweet from the waffle itself but overall it is just warm and had a nice balance of fluffy and chewy.

RYBjCf4wyESaKNdIXAthPA.text: I live 6 minutes away from this place and I just happened to run into this place. When we first entered, we were instantly greeted. The guy at the the register asked if it was our first time, and it was. So he gave us a few minutes to decide, we asked a few questions and he recommended us a few things off the menu. After we ordered, the food took no longer than 10 mins for everything to come. Plus free wifi (can't say no to that lol). The food was great, enviornment was great and the staff is great. I will definitely come back here and try the other drinks and food. I highly recommend this place.

Q41Vb4xtL4-zmyNqxeZbNA.text: Atmosphere: naturally well lit, cafe style layout with open counter and free WiFi.  Beverage: pistachio latte with no expresso. Very tasty and addictive. Waffles are light and crispy crunchy with light soft inside.   Waffle breakfast sandwich was delicious. The cheese was great.  Service: very friendly and bubbly like. Offered more dressing and asked if we needed any else a few times. No gossiping behind counter unlike most casino cafes. They seemed all very happy, adding to the light atmosphere.   Clean restrooms  Definitely going back.

CsTZqNlqKEb25zLg0Vnjbg.text: My boyfriend is extremely particular when it comes to his morning coffee and this place was as close to his Illy cup he makes at home. We weren't planning on eating breakfast here until the owner told us they had gluten free waffles!!! The chef thoroughly cleaned the waffle maker for 10 minutes before making our waffles. It was well worth the wait and he did it right in front of us ( the kitchen is open).   The owner is welcoming and told us they have vegan and gluten free items. I also noticed they had bakery items (from a different maker) that are gf and vegan.  I ate the wafflewich with eggs, cheese, and turkey sausage. Yummy! Best of all, The (regular) waffle was flawless: warm, crispy on the outside, and chewy on the inside. Even better dipped into the tasty maple syrup!   My boyfriend got the gf waffle. He loved  that the whipped butter was soft and spread evenly. Melted right away!

ww4MizwdNyac8G2JdAR83Q.text: Such delicious food, went here for lunch and had a delicious waffle sandwich South American wafflewich and I Had the ice cream sandwich delicious  The smells in the restaurant was amazing

7A3xXxpwyS75KBK2AUgnuA.text: First time coming here, let me tell you I'm freaking in love. This place is waaayy underrated & so cheap. I love the atmosphere, the guy who took our order was helpful & very welcoming. I'll for sure be coming back on my next day off! I wish there were more of these than Starbucks or Dunkins.  I love Tiabi

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TdpHrr8zRhuGQsgwDU5JJQ.text: Waffle bar. Those two words were what initially lured me into this place. I mean, who could resist the thought of personalized-topped waffles? Add the incentive of a groupon, and I'm on it...but unfortunately, I have to say that I was slightly disappointed both times I went.  I had gone to eat here when they had opened a few months ago. I didn't particularly have an optimal experience - my boyfriend's hashtag waffles were served a little cold, and though we were the only customers there, I remember we had to wait a good amount of time for our food to arrive. I understand that this place was just starting out and just getting into the groove of things, so I chalked it up to that factor and refrained from writing a negative review. Additionally, the location is kind of sketchy, but they have no control over that really.   Flash forward. I decided to give it another shot a few months later. I ordered a dirty mocha chai and a West Coast waffle sandwich (bacon, chicken strips, avocado, tomato and cheese), which was the same exact order I had the first time around. The sandwich is what I'm giving the extra star for. It's worth a try, pretty good. It was better this time too as far as the amount of toppings go. Very filling.   The bad news: Service time is still pretty lousy. I even added the pre-tip in hopes of speeding up our food, but it was in vain. The employees are friendly, but I was expecting a smoother and more efficient delivery. They should train the people in charge of preparing the food a lot better. It shouldn't take long to make a waffle and add the trimmings. Especially if the trimmings don't require much maintenance and cooking at all. I'm all about trying small businesses and was really rooting for their success, but it was just disappointing to see that this place hasn't fully quite worked out its kinks yet.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. west coast waffle sandwich and a side of chips.

Fours stars, it's not close and def out of my way or I would be here more often than not.  My latest visit I ventured out of my espresso shot habit and ordered a pistachio latte: Half the sweetness  Non fat milk End result: pistachio delight! e0Diauq7zgAOKEwO6JXe2Q.text: Went to Vegas for a wedding weekend and was looking for an inexpensive breakfast spot off of the Strip. Glad we found this place after driving around for a while.  We were greeted friendly at register despite being indecisive for a few seconds. So many options, all sounded so good.  We ordered the West Coast waffle and Butter Pecan waffle with Tiff's Waffle Macchiato for $27.  delicious!!! The butter pecan waffles was a great alternative for the pumpkin (since they ran out) and I was glad to have ordered it as a random decision since I'm not weary of ordering any kind of waffles that are way too sweet. I initially ate the waffle without spreading the butter at first and actually preferred it that way. There was way too much butter once I decided to spread it around.  This place got me wishing that the 805 area has a place like this!! Loved the macchiato!! Definitely would recommend this place.  We also ordered a 3rd waffle (forgot which one, but similar to the west coast) and the same drink to take back to my sis at the hotel... Well, my 17 month old ended eating the entire waffle and loved it, too!

0zRtwQi8lBAbS0ULEv-yUA.text: We wanted to get off the strip for a cheaper meal. My wife knows I love waffles so we ubered to this place. It's in a strip mall near a target. Prices are low, coffee was excellent, and waffles were tasty. I had a bacon waffle and the latte with the churro waffle. Both were great. Service was quick. My wife loved her egg dish. It's about 3 miles off the strip which seems like forever and I imagine it could be if hot, but when we went early in the morning in April, we enjoyed a long walk to work off breakfast and see other stops on the strip. If you want to save some money on breakfast in Vegas definitely worth a stop.

v11L2G9DmdeTS0xleUs4WQ.text: Very small Hipster cafe in the middle of a busy street and plaza feels very downtown inside with the art on the wall and parking the chalk board menu the whole set up ..:.i had the pistachio latte hot (gave it to me kind of cold ) but it was delish not too sweet.  Waffle Wednesday !!!! It's BOGO day on their Classic waffles so yea I took advantage of the deal !  The Waffles were big but not thick (good because I wanted a morning snack not too many calories lol )  #1 waffle =Butter Pecan omg omg omg still making my mouth water a bit .  #2 waffle : strawberry with chocolate drizzle and whip cream also very good but man that butter pecan !!!

9IPbn9dtJYV6ESzzoSRQnw.text: Great place to grab a quick bite to eat for breakfast. Their waffles are thin but very tasty and will keep you coming back for more.

aYdQjZBE3ZvG_wdhI9uEFA.text: My review solely relates to the waffle sandwiches. I LOVE waffles and love idea of sweet and savory food but my craving for a yummy sandwich and chicken was only faintly satisfied. The problem was the flavor, or lack there of. I got the West Coast, which comes with chicken, avocado, bacon, tomato, cheese and Tiabi sauce. Somehow the sandwich was really dry and missed the flavor the mentioned ingredients should have given. The waffle had no crispiness or flavor at all. Super bland. This is my second time having Tiabi, the first was probably about a year ago and as i remember it was underwhelming as well. I will try ONE more time and see if sweet waffles are better.

Yhyi2a_FhYbt8nO_Hsk0XA.text: When they first sat down the plate I was disappointed it wasn't a huge Belgium waffle...until I took a bits. The waffle was perfectly cooked, they are the perfect size, and perfect sweetness...not too sweet, not bland. Nice  atmosphere and great coffee. Gentleman behind the counter was super helpful and sweet and did a good job catering to the obnoxious, needy, grumpy old couple in front of us.

CaEqm-7BxM9knO-EwgipNQ.text: Cute local vibe, gal at the counter was friendly and the breakfast waffle was just what I needed! My short iced latte wasn't too confusing (its amazing how many people are confused when you don't want 2cups of sugar in your latte) I will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GrmQeWyFnMvLOEY6kj1V8A.text: I decided to come here on a Friday at 1 p.m. while visiting Las Vegas. The pictures on Yelp looked absolutely wonderful which made me really want to go.  Parking is free and was easy to find. The store is located in a strip mall with okay ambience, but nothing that I was too impressed with.   I decided to order Tiff's Waffle Macchiato because the combination of a coffee and waffle seemed amazing. While the churro waffle was tasty, the coffee was super gross and I could not finish it. It made me wish that I had only ordered a waffle and not gone for the coffee.  While the service was friendly, I was not asked whether I wanted my order for here or to-go and their default was to make it to-go. It was only after they tried to hand me the waffle in a paper bag that I corrected them that I would like it for here. That was sort of disappointing and I wish I was asked while ordering instead.  If I come back it will be for the waffles only and to try some of the vegan menu items. I would definitely not recommend getting coffee here.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tiff&#39;s Waffle Macchiato (waffle is good, but coffee is horrible)

XRkAUVPtfBR1VfCam69cng.text: Oh Tiabi.   "To Inspire and Be Inspired."  My visit yesterday was definitely inspirational.  I came out here last month for the Yelp Coffee Cruise event, and have been trying to make it back since.  Yesterday, I was in the area for a birthday party a little early, so I popped in for coffee and a waffle.    Tiabi is an adorable little coffee shop, hidden away in the strip mall near Target on Flamingo and Maryland Parkway.  Before the Coffee Cruise, I had no idea it existed, even though I frequent that area all the time.   Yesterday, when I stopped in,  I took a look at their drink and waffle menu, and decided on the Twilight Lavender Latte, and the Golden Waffle.   Service was super friendly.  The cashier was polite, and the girl who made my waffle had an infectious smile.  Tiffany, the owner, remembered me from the Cruise, and said hello after I had been seated.  We chatted for a minute, and then my waffle was ready.  So...the coffee.   Light.  Flavorful.  Aromatic.   Delicious.  I may have done myself a disservice in ordering the Twilight Lavender Latte on my first time back, because I may not ever want to order another drink as long as this is available.  It is SO good...I shared a sip with a friend when I arrived at the birthday party, and her whole face lit up, it is THAT delicious.  Home Run, Tiabi.  Home Run.   The waffle.  Oh, the waffle.  The Golden Waffle is simple.  Its a light, crisp on the outside, fluffy on the inside, golden, perfect waffle.  Its dusted with powdered sugar, and served with butter on the side.  There was syrup on the table, but I didn't need any, and I normally drown my waffles in syrup.    Sweet.  Delicate.  Awesome.    Tiabi, I'm so glad I had the time to pop by yesterday.  You've excelled at making me feel welcome, and the quality of your offerings is truly inspiring.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Waffle
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Twilight Lavender latte

duUhkxKBDbQyAWLoL0aBWQ.text: The Good : We had the waffles with fruit and a bananatella waffle. They were all delicious!! We also had iced coffees which were great as well. The staff is super friendly.   The Bad: they forgot to make one of our waffles. We had to remind them.   The Ugly: the restroom was a bit dirty and we went right when they opened.   But, yes , I recommend this place. Flaws were minor.

_M24IktYmluVNnRplTeuJQ.text: Food on point, service not so much. 20 minutes just to order and another 25 minutes to make it. Not sure why they have 2 people working on a Sunday morning but they definitely need more employees to man the long lines. Waffle breakfast sandwich was good, a little over cooked on the egg but the waffle was perfect. The coffee drink was tasty as was the chips and the fruit. zGOoB8Ezo4OArHgcqnyaUg.text: Great little place! The employees were so nice, The waffle came out warm (crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside), my daughter ordered the twilight lavender latte. She said that the best part was that it WASNT too sweet. The lavender was the perfect strength. Price wise, such a bargain! Great place.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy red velvet waffle with chocolate drizzel

lGSU4sAtqEgTAVNP4aKiaA.text: I stopped in here at about 7:45am on a Tuesday to a restaurant with about 3 people seated inside.   I was warmly greeted upon entering the door. The somewhat nondescript, simple interior had the menu on the wall.  The lady gave me a run down of the 5 Wafflewiches, point out her favorite as well as the most popular West Coast Wafflewich.   I ordered the #Breakfastsandwich and was somewhat underwhelmed. The waffle was soft but the flavor was very distinct and there was no sauce to liven it up.  I ask for a side of the Tiabi sauce, a basil based sauce that was ok, but not a compliment for the entree but probably pretty good on another entree that had Chicken.   I guess my biggest disappointment came from the limited menu selections and the fact that there was only one "breakfast-like" sandwich.   A lunchtime meal might be perceived differently.   To their credit they had quick and friendly service, but I would have to try something else to "wow" me.  Would I go back? Sure. Would I make a special trip to visit this specific place? Nah.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. #breakfastsandwich with turkey sausage, eggs and cheese.

BOPzYxgSOEJv3zxu2Qqopg.text: The place was playing classic rock which was an immediate plus. We were the first customers that day and the woman who was working at the time was very nice. I ordered a bananaetta (a waffle with bananas and nutella) and was not disappointed. The banana's were delicious. I also enjoyed the vanilla chai latte. This is one of the few places where I felt like I paid the right amount for what I received.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Banana nutella waffle!

e_2gQjeYr3GzuE_jq-w42g.text: Needed to kill some time yesterday in the area so decided to give this place a try. Had the Elvis waffle which was ok but had way too much peanut butter for my taste and pretty much overwhelmed everything else. Also tried the snickers iced coffee which was excellent. Service was friendly but slow. We waited about 15 minutes for our coffee and then at least another 20 for the waffle. Definitely not the place to come if you are in a hurry. Luckily I wasn't in a rush or starving. Overall decent but not really worth the wait.

PcKcgBK_DHSMGXgSRwBa_w.text: A pleasure to rest, drink, and study at! Staff is friendly and kind, coffee is strong and good, and the waffles taste like how waffles should: a delight. Music is not at all loud which is also appreciated. They've done a good job with this place.

aI_BweB6n0jODUeETJg9bQ.text: Awesome food! I had the hashtag waffle and could have had three more just to keep the taste in my mouth. The staff was also really nice and made recommendations for me when I couldn't decide what I wanted.    The place was a little tucked away off Maryland parkway but when you find it, it's like finding one of Vegas's secret gems. It's is very well priced and the ambiance is really chill and inviting.   I will defiantly be back and would recommend this place to everyone!

1a_kgeAl7qyab81pM01Yxg.text: Totally digged this spot! Great service and yummy menu! I had the waffledilla and pistachio latte with soy milk. Forgot to add on avocado on my waffledilla but it was still yummy! I'll be sure to visit again when I'm in Vegas :)

S9c40l_qXZaHQ1EkFRqFdw.text: I tried this place this morning and it was a great experience. I ordered an iced Tiff's Waffle Machiatto and it was bombdotcom. Just the right amount of sweetness, just the right amount of milkyness, and just the right amount of ice. The quality of the coffee is legitimate. A+ on the drink.  I also ordered some golden classic Belgium waffles. Finally, I find a place here in Las Vegas with real waffles. Waffles are supposed to consist of a juxtapose balance of crispy exteriors and soft almost custardy interiors. These waffles had that. They were so delightful to eat that I didn't even bother drenching them with maple syrup or butter.   I would definitely go again for their coffee and 2 nice little Belgium waffles to accompany my delightful coffee. Great job Taibi! -Ozzy

FvDHYaFirGnKyyaGSdzTpw.text: Tiabi is a small little cafe located next to Target. I saw few students there studying since they offer free wifi. The prices were reasonable. I ordered the red velvet chocolate chip waffles. Some of the coffee beverages sounded yummy but I held off from getting one. I went during the evening so it was pretty much slow but there was some what of a wait to get our food. The waffles were good but it wasn't filling enough for me. Compared to Babystacks, Tiabi was just average.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Red velvet waffles with chocolate chips

EMyh_hEyPT0phn35ACaadQ.text: Omnomnomnom. We came here after reading a review on a vegan website. I'm the only vegan so we love finding yummy places that have vegan options.   We had the new vegan waffle burger, a caramel syrup macchiato with almond milk, a hashtag breakfast sandwich with bacon waffles, kisses waffle, and a strawberry sunrise smoothie. Everything was nom to the max (see first line). The sauce with the new vegan burger sandwich was amazing and we loved everything else.   The employees were very friendly and we loved playing cards while our food came. Thanks, Tiabi, for a great breakfast and living up to the hype! We'll be back.

HETr6BvbllZvWy82GjW1Uw.text: Just tried this place for the first time after seeing such good reviews! It definitely lives up to the hype. Very nice and relaxing environment once you come in with super friendly staff. Very classic spot and definitely worth trying out the wafflewiches!

W2JLKcMKcpbq2Ey1nCkeQQ.text: My husband and I visited this place while we were in vegas for our one year anniversary.  We give this place 5 stars. Taste is great and menu is original. It is a smaller joint and if busy be prepared to wait. Love the food, environment, and music. Would come back here if we visit vegas again.
