nfcyWR6dcz3uIBFqrq9s2w.text: Good coffee.. the waffles and waffle sandwiches were under impressive, ambiance was fine nothing special

lOkzJ3e07CF5C0Faod5qbA.text: very nice neighborhood place for a different kind of treats. Yes I'd return. There's an I Hop across the street, this is  better.  Although there is a smaller list to choose from. It's a lot of fantastic food here. Stop in you won't be disappointed.

hPFFOu5D5t-LhT5X6S1KPg.text: I really wanted to like this venue as it's a small business & the items on the menu seem fairly tasty,  but the service was lacking.   We came with a family of four. The kids were served their food & finished eating (20 minutes) before the other food arrived. I was truly floored!  The kids initially wanted to wait for our food to arrive, however, had they waited their food would have been cold.   We also ordered a side of eggs & bacon to accompany the waffles we ordered. That too was served 20 minutes apart.   The hostess/owner apologized & said their was a "mixup" but I wasn't impressed with the lack of concern that was given with our poor dining experience.   I know this is a new venue & only opened a month ago but sometime & effort really needs to be put into the flow of business. We came to eat as a family & that did not happen. I'm extremely disappointed.

_njxcxkjRUE3fYh4VcBiEg.text: Honest opinion is that it's all right, nothing at all to rave about other then maybe the atmosphere of the place.   The two sandwiches I tried was flat out BLAND, the waffle in itself was uninspired with no actual flavor. The break-the-fast was overwhelmed by the bacon, I could not taste the cheese or egg. And the other was completely forgettable, left a "why" in my mouth. Why did they add two together, it tasted gross.   Maybe I'll come back and try to test out other products they sell, see if standalone items like waffles or coffee would be a reason to comeback. But don't let the hype fool you, it's a 2 Star at BEST. And that's because of how the atmosphere felt.

DvBf_KfkqWkl9locRnbwRQ.text: What a spectacular find! The lady working was so friendly and helpful. There are different waffle sandwiches you can get or you can do a build your own waffle with custom toppings. I got the classic golden waffle but I want to go back to try the churro waffle! They also have a pretty expansive drinks menu that range from creamy espresso drinks to light teas with basil! The prices are pretty good, for two customized waffles and a coffee was about $16. This place is definitely worth a try.

0fvvkM3M-UxwhXvfivhE7Q.text: Came back the very next day. I will be craving the Guru burger for weeks. This seriously needs to be on a vegan foodie bucket list.

ZngJ9up8iknZk-3JlSKhiw.text: Recently hit up this ADORABLE spot on our recent trip to Vegas since we had a groupon and oh man was it worth the trip from the strip!   The place itself is adorable and throughout my various trips to Vegas (yes, we explore off strip, weird I know), it seems like small local businesses just aren't as popular like here in Austin so I love to see that..but I digress.   Onto the yummies: The hashtag breakfast sandwich was the shit. Not too heavy but totally delicious and filling! The waffle my fiance had was outstanding! Forget what it was called but it had Nutella and pretty much blew my mind.   The owners were there and we chit chatted and they were so nice!! Wonderful food, GREAT staff, and overall a much needed break from the Vegas strip. Can't wait to try it out again in April when we go back!

8Rs3ibdUgNNeryvmH74uFg.text: Came here on 3 separate occasions. Loved everything we tried! The 3rd time I came, service was a bit slow and had to get my stuff to go, but it's because so many people enjoy eating here.  1. Green smoothies are always good. 2. I love their lollies.

to75kwB5YZhjJax_kHQ1Zg.text: Amazing vegan waffles, I loved the guru burger. We were just driving BG through Vegas and had been looking for vegan waffles since we left Virginia. We were not disappointed.

S0cV7BYg0rcDJhX_OeiBow.text: Delicious! There was a quite a wait before receiving our food but they warned us. It's a good think we shared because we ordered a sandwich and a waffle and they came out separately. Both were good. It's nice see them making everything fresh in front of us.

V_Khc2y2r6Rr_CdXN8SGKg.text: Cute little place that has great tasting waffles. I ordered a double belgian waffle with vegan butter and a large iced coffee. The waffle had the perfect crunch and the right doughy center. I really like the fact that they offer vegan/vegetarian options. The vegan waffle with bananas and pecans is great.  I wish the service didn't take so long though. The two girls behind the counter are sweet but I don't think their business can handle a rush if need be.

mE58-LeCr97Cz_BvNUwYGA.text: Been here many times. I only order online cause it's easier to see my options and when I get there the wait is not long. I've ordered their smoothies, coffee, waffles, salad and from their lunch menus. I would drive 35 minutes almost every weekend just to come here. Great prices. Great staff. This is my Starbucks :)

nhn0EdP2_2xKiQRMW1IjdQ.text: The first of its name! The prodigal child of both coffee and waffle! The place where it all started and the original bringer of delicious not to all. My experiences are short here but oh so memorable. It is comforting to have the consistency in flavors and service that I have come to look forward in my every day life on both sides of town. I know come here and expect to get any one of their signature drinks or waffles and it to blow away my taste buds like no other. I also know that I can see the same great attitude and customer service from anyone in the staff. They are all kind and eager to help in any way they can and are always professional. If I ever find myself frequenting this location as much as the location in the north I know I will never be disappointed which is something that few coffee or waffle or both can guarantee so well as they do. No matter where you are in Vegas do not be afraid to venture out or go somewhere so delectable that should blow your mind. I know when I see opportunity for something Fantastic I am always down. Ps. I am always excited to see the new items they have to offer. Yum!

dRFqCNu9o-f-Vw9dFXD49g.text: My husband and I had a terrible experience there. I purchased a goupon and thought it would be a good reason to try a new restaurant. First: The employee who took my order put her hand inside my coffee cup when she picked it up. I asked her to please give me a new cup, and that putting her hand inside the cup is unacceptable. As she replaced the cup she said, "We wash our hands." Second: When the same employee brought us our silverware, it was wet and dirty. I took them to the counter and asked for clean, dry silverware. Third: The service was extremely slow. A party of four ordered before us, and they received 2 of their orders in approx 10 minutes, and the other 2 orders approx 10 minutes later. The employee explained that they can only make a couple of orders at a time, and offered some cookies as consolation. Fourth: We got our order 30 minutes after we ordered it. I had the egg, sausage, cheese waffle sandwich. The egg and sausage were heated in the microwave and tasted like rubber. The only good things: The gentleman that made our coffees did an excellent , and the strawberries on my husband's waffles were fresh. I spoke to the manager, explained why we were there, our experience, and that we will not be back. I do not recommend this restaurant.

Ob2coCyuDctFtBMeqK9S3A.text: Bought a groupon for half price tiabi food! Was confusing but thats groupons fault. AMAZING food! I got the hashtag breakfast sandwich and strawberry sunrise smoothie. Def worth going off the beaten path to eat here :)))))

74cJ7SnJp-CD3x8GEl389A.text: Unfortunately, only 1 waffle maker was working when me and my party of 8! came in. I'm sure rolling out one dish at a time is not the norm. Personally, I don't get waffles as sandwich breads. But, everyone else in my party will give this place 4 or 5 stars for the food. Customer service and coffees were on point.

hX8YKFISMtpgxboTKine9Q.text: Order the kisses with bacon. Its the best thing you will every place in your mouth. Think strawberry and bacon infused waffle with whipped cream and nutella to top it off. It is fabulous and they make it super cutsie. Staff here is awesome, they really know what they are doing and have a knowledge of what people like.

Q2X7B9EyvOunbdvVpLAGWw.text: Very good food at an affordable price. Just know that everything is freshly made so this isn't a fast food restaurant. Plane to be there for at least 10-15 to get your food but it's worth it! And it doesn't have all that junk you would get at other restaurants.  Try the Californian! And students get a discount! Just show your ID!

rRe8EQBeBkXNoyIc2ACHhw.text: Great vibs owners are sweet def luv the reggae music waffles are ahhhmazing  overall best breakfast spot off the strip!! :D

beM_yeJAEoFSQmWG5Vs3eA.text: The service was amazing and the ladies working, I believe owners a well, were so nice. I have had better coffee but I am from Seattle, and I hanger had much worst coffee here on Vegas. The vegan waffles were so good and moist as well. It is out of my way a bit, but could be a special treat every once in awhile

jKewgeiXnqPEPooG2cc5XA.text: Very cool local business. Excellent customer service and a great menu. Places like this make my mornings happy :)  Excellent prices, fun ambiance, healthy menu options, and super chill staff. Highly recommended.

PAUde89VnB0sjqM6LYEZjQ.text: Must try: # Tiff's Waffle Macchiato! Yummy coffee. Nice people. The wafflewiches are good too!

63C8ACmeSmRaPfGsUTVI3Q.text: Eat breakfast here with the wife a couple times a month.  If you want a sweet treat get a Tiffs waffle macchiato.  It's got a churro waffle wedge on top.

W0Kf7UI34yKD9WwPbdnwaw.text: The food and drinks were very good. The service was just okay. The lady taking orders was not very friendly,  but the people putting the food out were very nice and apologetic for being slow.

a1C9RBgLC0YLMMJiSWcYGA.text: Delicious food! Had the #breakfast sandwich, west coast sandwich, red velvet lollipop, and strawberry sunrise smoothie and everything was delicious. Employees are helpful and friendly too. Matter of time before lines are out the door!

MIioWdB67o-vuaqpv34Y7Q.text: Delicious and friendly staff/owners! I went here with some friends after a hike with at Mt. Charleston and this was definitely what we craved! The 'Waffle macchiato', which was actually a cinnamon vanilla latte that came with a delicious cinnamon sugar covered waffle was PERFECT. We all enjoyed (this is a very modest statement because everything was fantastic) our food. We will be coming back again!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waffle macchiato

waVsCdq3BjNS5wvwpnZ_-A.text: Came in with my family of 4 (including two kids)...ordered Tiabi Red Velvet, Hashtag, two Hash Tag Sandwhiches and two mocha latee's...food was pretty good...coffee was sweet...ambiance was cute...seating was lacking...staff is nice...service was super slow...50 minutes to get 1/2 our order out!!!  Over an hour to get second half of order!!!  It's a fairly new establishment...hopefully they pick it up...it has a lot of potential.  I probably wont be back.

FWOKkfiSlBQ5ue63KPvqwQ.text: Great food at a good price!      My son and I love eating here! The waffles are amazing and so are the BZB's. My son asks to eat here at least once a week since he first tried it.   Great spot!

a5QnDm6Gj6gknYzb6kZZHg.text: Great little place. My Belgian style bacon waffle was perfect! Plenty of parking, fast WiFi, & super-friendly folks.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon waffle!!!

TGF6xRZ24oBbEPCyWszMgA.text: It was ok. Great place if you have any dietary needs! Their gluten free waffle was amazing, Adams their vegan ice cream was quite delicious as well. Pretty good coffee, although a little burned. The inside was mostly clean, but kind of run down.

0LawHV0Z5yk9gVorRCr3zA.text: Hastag breakfast is surprisingly McD like, just with waffles instead of buns! West Coast Wafflewich is delightful, just right for those who like small morning bites. Maple Bacon Waffle has Bacon made into the Waffle! That's another pleasant surprise.   Strawberry Sunrise and Banana Berry is both very good healthy smoothie.

l8PaYoBzRUCQOKotMV9WGA.text: Great coffee spot just a few miles down from the Rio. Easy to get to. Great coffee and waffles. My daughter and I split the Elvis. Service was excellent all the staff was friendly. Not a fake give me your money friendly, a real genuine friendliness. Will have to remember to come back in future Vegas trips.

hOatCyX0jWrs0ZDOp6CFTg.text: Great place for a coffee date with someone else or with yourself.  Nice unique drink offerings.

wVbR5_iGfgjyxI2ExXpUTQ.text: Just passing by and stop to have branch here. Great place with good prices. Polite and nice waiters. Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast sandwich with bacon

aStmUnf5DjL0zmzkyA53vA.text: This place is great! We just discovered it and ate here twice in two days. The waffles are the perfect mix of soft and crispy. I had one folded into a sandwich with bacon egg and cheese. The bacon was crispy and eggs fluffy. So good! We also tried the butter pecan waffle with candied pecans on top. The best! To top it off, their coffee drinks are delicious too. And in cool flavors like coconut truffle, honey nutmeg, or lavender latte. They aren't too sugary, and the espresso is awesome. They have cool tea flavors too. I want to try them all!

KTTQoeoPLXm6SL9B2pBDGw.text: The food was amazing. Everything was executed to perfection. Each bite of the Bananatella has bananas, almonds, and Nutella.

drzNUhWuzpDFV7JhYCg1OQ.text: It's sooo good that I can find a place have such special coffee I never try waffle with avocado before it's amazing!

q4XEJMdKqgPjrbCwcL78Lw.text: Their Waffledilla with avocado was delicious!  My family thoroughly enjoyed their waffle sandwiches too!

ZPHhDAyyx3ZpwpEneRMWUA.text: From the moment you walk in this place... You are transported to Seattle coffee house that has mated with a gastropub (if there is such a thing). Anyway it goes, I loved it. The food was so good and the culture is one all it's own. The service was top notch; friendly, knowledgeable, and attentive. I'm really impressed and look forward to the new menu.

sdhjEh5NGlGNRC96X27s3Q.text: Their vegan wafflewich is pretty tasty! I really wish they were 100% vegan! Vegan butter and vegan waffles taste just the same if not better than dairy butter or waffles. Same with their coffees. Would be way better if they were vegan. Also, the service is pretty annoying... my mother and I ordered the vegan waffle sandwiches and two coffees and I had to go up to the bar four separate times to get each item.

l6zXhdbDk8wZ2UXklTyClw.text: Yelnel was a super nice person. I probably murdered her name though. Sorry lady lolol

1OcHS5a8511OaoA8OClpwA.text: Ordered the breakfast club waffle sandwich, this was very good.  Meats  had the right balance of flavor with the waffle.  Nicely done, good staff, and a fair price.

Hjzzj58rR_UgtpgOeuKSOA.text: A very cute coffee shop with amazing food and of course coffee. I tried their Viva Las Elvis which is vegan when taking out the honey and it was delicious! I keep coming back just for that waffle. The atmosphere is calm and it's clean!

S9v1qgFVjxsR542K0ldjsw.text: This place was AMAZING. I got the vegan Viva alas Vegas waffle (waffle with PB, banana, agave, and coconut bacon) and my mom got a waffle with fresh fruit. It was all heavenly, and the environment is very laid back as well. The employees were so nice too!!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

G2dhj7l0fuP-7M4Kw4WZgA.text: 4.5 stars!!  It's surprising how much this place has grown on me. It's really not a bad place coffee, small bites, etc. nearby UNLV. I've tried multiple items and have been satisfied each time - never have I felt I wasted my money.   Hot White Mango Tea - I was having a huge headache and getting this hot tea definitely made me feel better. I'm not usually a flavored hot tea person but this will be my togo when I'm craving a hot and healthier beverage.  Iced Caramel Macchiato - The coffee taste here is suuuper heavy - not too much of my thing, will skip this for the future.  Tropical Siena and Just Peachy Tea - they are separate teas and I've tried them both. The taste for both were a bit subtle, can live without it in the future.  Red Velvet Frappe - holy crap is it good here or what. Per me since I don't like too much chocolate, I've asked them to lessen the Cocoa and oh my, it is delish. Per bun it's probably the best we've found out here so far.  Waffle Sandwiches:  The Waffle Dilla - add the avocado. You'll thank me later.  Cheers!

1JARTkuY4rR7GyoMKuM85g.text: This place is AWESOME!! I love all of the Vegan options!! I had the Guru Burger and the Coconut mint lemonade. I highly recommend it!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Guru Burger was AMAZING!!! Perfect for breakfast, lunch or dinner.  Thanks Jay for the recommendation.

ScOYLkJVkcywVaov_1rmFg.text: We came here on a Saturday and it was really busy. The wait took forever because the amount of people there. There's also a limited amount of tables available. And from what I saw, they only had three waffle makers. You would expect a waffle place to have more waffle makers than just three, which probably added to the wait. Unless, they have more waffle makers hidden from view, which makes the waiting a little worse if they do. However, I suppose the waffles were worth the wait.  They are pretty cheap for a big (at least for me) sized waffle. Here in California, waffles that big cost about $9-$10 but in Vegas, they were half the price. They have a variety of different waffles to choose from if you prefer waffles or a waffle sandwich. They even have a vegan menu if that's for you. They also have a huge variety of drinks.  I'll definitely be back here again when I return to Vegas. I look forward to trying the different waffles and drinks on their menu.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bananutella, red velvet, and maple bacon waffle

ns_k6nY47DRgqURcNJrI5w.text: First off, Tiabi has both a Groupon and Living Social deal. The Groupon is $14.25 for 3 $8 deals. The Living Social is $4 for $8 or $6 for $12.   The shop is in the same plaza as the Target on Maryland Pkwy. It is to the right of Target if you're looking at it straight on. The shop itself is cute with some couches and drawings on the walls. Unfortunately, that's the only good thing I have to say.   The girl at the counter did not know how to use the Living Social deal we had. After calling 2 other workers over and charging us the wrong price she had to refund the entire order and start over. Also she never scanned the app so if I were not the good person that  I am, I could re-use the deal and get $12 of free food haha. You should probably teach your workers what to do with it!  After our food was made they placed the food on the counter and called our names, however we didn't hear them and the food ended up sitting on the counter for a couple of minutes. There were four workers in the store all standing around behind the counter talking. Take the time to bring the order out guys! It was obvious we didn't hear you and it wasn't like you were busy- it was the only new order you had.  I thought it was a little rude that you would call our name out again instead of just walking it over.   We ordered the bananatella waffle and pac man waffle. The bananatella was good, but nothing I was impressed with/would want to go back for. The presentation of the pac man waffle was horrible. I hope there's a picture of it on here, because I forgot to take one. Who wants a waffle that's a quarter missing?   The dirty mocha chai sounded amazing on the menu board, but it was all disappointment in my mouth. It was just a strange combination and did not work for me.

r2bEXJacqZfd2oj2k01yzw.text: Love this place. Cheaper than Starbucks. I had the frankenstein espresso and hubby had the signature iced macchiato that comes with a waffle. Both delicious and huge drinks for under $10.  Minutes from the strip. Will def be back.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I wanted these
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Frankenstein and iced macchiato that comes with a waffle   Both delish :)

ND7E4exixVnyuiL2zZKp8Q.text: I love Tiabi! I come here because they have the best selection of waffles and waffle sandwiches. It's the best. It's a nice place to relax and have a cup of coffee too!

eZV_axuFOG_48kxsbUmOGw.text: Came here because of the reviews and the one $. Definitely lived up to our expectations!!!! While we were staring at the menu the cashier asked us if we wanted help with ordering (LOVE be asked as opposed to someone just jumping in!!) he asked what my taste preferences were and offered examples, sweet, savory, etc. he then made suggestions based on our answers. We took his suggestions and we were very pleased! He was totally on point!! I also had the coffee of the day, Guatemalan. Smooth and robust! Not bitter like another coffee place we all know and love ;) ! I cannot wait to come back try a few other items! I definitely want to try their Kale smoothie next, sounds divine!

qmdiULv07-8h9khFCd2ZpA.text: First time in Vegas and tiabi was recommended by my cousin who lives here. A few minutes away from the strip but well worth the drive. Terrific prices for excellent waffles that are healthy too!

VwTd6Bwolpq56Aj5a1RVng.text: Great fast service. Nice relaxing enviroment, especially if you are staying on the strip. Reasonable prices and portions.

BbmUltwP6MmFnBCL8vEqog.text: Absolute best. Must come in and have the waffle macchiato. Just perfect. A Vegas staple for us. I also have the viva Las Vegas waffle. Great!

Ec2aHMiAV0L3x3yATeSvvA.text: Delicious most unique coffee and waffle shop. With a friendly and helpful staff. Came here a couple days ago. Can't believe what I've been missing. Although I didn't have the waffle, the lavender latte was a hit, bought my daughter the charcoal infused lemonade. It's black and taste like a fantastic glass of lemonade! Pretty exciting. My husband had the java jolt. He loved it, gave him the kick he needed. We'll definitely be. Everything tasted amazing.

f1QqgcMFo3ErZ8JRLoUDjA.text: Best customer service in town! Delicious waffles i broke up with Starbucks to get my lattes here at Tiabi best coffee ever come try !

l1K0mj_j1FHGTVQDFPaxhQ.text: I wish I found this place sooner! Excellent coffee, great food, friendly customer service and WAFFLES! What's not to love? I highly recommend the first signature coffee, Tiff's. Sooo good and comes with a small piece of waffle dipped in cinnamon and sugar on top that you can dip in the coffee for a savory treat. The lattes were also incredible, and every food item (breakfast & lunch) I have loved! Super conveniently located if you go to UNLV, literally down the street in the Target shopping center.

fSZRIeolbDR3AvOaj6Un_Q.text: Amazing vegan options! Had the vegan churro waffle with bananas, chocolate chips, and vegan bacon, definitely recommend.

3H6TcQK2yUgHxrV2R_G1Mg.text: This place is yummylicious! I would recommend this place!  My daughter loved her pumpkin churro waffle and we enjoyed the west coast waffle sandwich!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

divYObk3JoXL-2gbW4lI5g.text: Probably the best waffle ever. Perfect amount of crispiness. The butter was just enough and light. The guys that run this place already have the reviews to match the restaurant. The mix of healthy options to compliment the waffle are a bonus. The service was top notch. Super friendly and customer service oriented.

QBM0amGNmw_OqlEGB4pNgw.text: I've seriously lived within 5minutes away from Tiabi for 3 years now and I can't believe I have just barely discovered it! I would always go to the target in the same plaza and Sakana sushi right next to it, so I always saw Tiabi's sign... I just never actually went in until a few weeks ago! Since then I've been addicted and wish I walked in to try it sooner!  So far I've tried the Break Your Fast, Hashtag Breakfast Sandwich, Tokyo Sandwich, Guru Burger, and the churro waffle as well as the Honey Cream Latter, Lavender Latte, and my favorite yet - the Pistachio latte!! I am seriously addicted.   Needless to say, customer service is amazing. The staff are all so welcoming and kind.   As for the food.. The way they make their waffles is so different than I'm used to. They're thinner than typical fluffy waffles, which give their sandwiches the perfect crunch and texture! I assumed the waffle sandwiches would be soggy, but they weren't at all. Also, for the dessert waffles, the waffles have the perfect texture. While the outside is crispy, the inside is still quite fluffy despite how thin it is! Specifically for the churro waffle, the cinnamon sugar was not at all too strong, it was perfect.. Not too sweet and not at all lacking flavor. Also don't be shy about trying out any of their waffle sandwiches, at first I was skeptical because I've never tried a waffle sandwich, but each one I've tried have been really good. Tiabi puts flavors and items that really compliment each other. I don't even know what their Tiabi sauce consists of, but it's a great flavor in many of their items.  Okay now for the drinks... If I had to single out my ultimate favorite Tiabi menu item I would have to say 100% the PISTACHIO LATTE. Hahaha. The staff must think I'm crazy because I've been coming back so many times for that drink. I get it hot with soy and ahhh it's literally heaven. It's so good that I make any of my friends around me to try it and each one of them were in love too. It's so silky with that perfect flavor of pistachio - seriously spot on pistachio! I have also tried the Lavender Latte and the Honey Cream Latte, which are good as well, but no where near the pistachio latte! Hahah  So by my review I think it's only obvious that I'm in love with this little whole in the wall and would recommend anyone to stop by. Aside from their food and drinks options, the little cafe itself is so adorable!! The decorations are cute and it's so cozy to do homework/study or even hang out with friends. Even though it's a bit small, they actually have plenty of tables/seats and even a cozy couch! Plus each table has a deck of cards and they also offer of board games for people to play as well. Awesome place, great food/drinks, with a lovely staff :)

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Back at it again with the soy pistachio latte, this time in a mason jar :)
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Trying the pistachio latte cold.. Get it hot, it&#39;s way better!!
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Guru Burger, it&#39;s vegan!

JNSUC-cVMhc4ObhKm7LASA.text: Bomb waffles! And great (nutty) tasting pistachio iced lattes. I had just a the plain waffle, it was super tasty. A dance party for my taste buds :)

ekdGz1fnZrp0w9FZvxQ4IQ.text: #breakfast sandwich was super delicious. Waffle with scramble egg and maple bacon. Jon had the strawberry Kisses breakfast. Both were served hot and scrumptious!  We shared a Strawberry Sunrise smoothie.  Oh my gosh, it was just the right sweetness from the fruit.  All the people  working here a are great, so friendly!  I really appreciate that.  The cherry on top of this put stop is the prices. They are so reasonable.  What you need after a three day stay in Vegas!  Lol. Let's just say I am super satisfied!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Jon&#39;s breakfast!  Looks yummy!

eF2FCnF0MdsbyuN5cxO3cw.text: It is a good breakfast place with a lot of waffle options. I had a waffle burger which wasn't that great. My wife had a strawberry banana waffle and it was great. My guess is the sweet waffles are great - savory ones may be a miss here. They have some creative coffee options as well. A solid place to check out.

pPK56kiy9LmSErRPOPGDHQ.text: It seems to be so rare at times, but they've got it here. Perfect customer service. Friendly, cheerful, helpful, inviting. Felt like I'd known them for years or were neighbors. Food was great too. Need more tables, but place was clean. Music cheerful and modern indie. They thanked everyone too as they left. This was our last stop on our visit to Vegas this trip. I'll be back in a week and likely swing by for breakfast again. I got the golden waffles.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2xTKUPVkTWt8K0Wrt1sxDg.text: Bookmarked. Just wish I lived closer, then I'd be here more often. The Twilight Lavender & Pistachio lattes are my fave. West Coast Wafflewich is bomb. Customer service is always great, never been disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wicked Witch Latte - hot &amp; iced

WRMarAIZBQptaR_3BlqIBg.text: Wow. Everyone was telling the truth. This is a must eat place! Get the pistachio latte or you have not lived. I also loved one of the wafflewiches. I highly recommend the West Coast.

xmQggU4JUAN1fcGi8_kZXQ.text: I hate to leave a poor review for them because they are super nice and cute concept. We have tried this place multiple times wanting to love it. We always have a super long wait, I'm talking 45 min for two waffles, there is no consistency (order is ALWAYS different) and our orders are always wrong. To wait 45 min for cold wrong food is just so disappointing. Missing key items that are listed on the menu like whipped cream on a waffle that literally has 3 toppings is just sad and inexcusable or missing items you specifically ask for every single time is just not good.

lYq6eu0UILG_rOjD738VUQ.text: I was craving waffles while on my vacation in Vegas, and this place did not disappoint! Reasonable prices, welcoming staff, delicious food and drinks. The maple bacon waffle was great!

naYdevAwop-a_lcMGLhw0Q.text: I went with a group of seven and all of our dishes were great. Their smoothies are large and super refreshing. Great vegan options, highly recommend the Elvis (yum!) The workers took their time to perfect all the waffles which made the wait time worth while.

psmBLAmjtR9unZtoiV67cQ.text: Spent a day doing my homework here and really got thing a done! Quiet place to study on weekends. Loved the Waffle with strawberries!

wJqqP5ElZlRz_lTYtbsiow.text: The vegan waffles are to die for! My only complaint is that the service is quite slow, so make sure you have plenty of time scheduled for your meal.

x1MMotRBjIxaK5CceUM0SQ.text: So many vegan options.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Reasonably priced.  Amazing food!

TRJziqLhGZzoDrOmWRfpZQ.text: Loved the food, coffee, and the service. Vegan and Gluten Free dedicated waffle makers are a welcome sight.

MQL_ubjA54QxQqVnpl2XBg.text: Decided to get the groupon and try this place out and it did not disappoint! Cody got the break the fast waffles and of course I opted out for something sweet, Banana Nutella waffles! Soooo good!

hUUODhscjRF6Hjyh6WuoCg.text: This place is very quaint. It reminds me of a small business in northern California. My favorite is the West Coast with a Kale Champ. This it's my favorite new spot. I hope the Las Vegas residents appreciate the new private business Tiabi has to offer. Both Tiffany and Mae are awesome and super sweet. The customer service is enough to keep you returning. Thanks ladies.

V50Iy2wBmYL_eRGbUFCwEg.text: Everything was awesome! I ordered the West Coast waffle sandwich and the BananaBerry smoothie. The only thing it lacked was that the sandwich took awhile for it to come out and it wasn't busy when I went, other than that I would definitely come back hoping for faster service!

3AZSHppdy3UoDracHtdHaQ.text: I like coming here in during the week in the mornings because it's chill. The owners are cool and the food/drinks here are great!   This past weekend, I took my cousin who was visiting from So Cal to try out the food/coffee. It was my first time seeing the other workers at the shop..  I was shocked to experience a customer having to clean a table for her and her family  when it clearly is not a customer's job to do so. The customer asked a worker for a wet rag so she can wipe down a table that had not been cleaned and still had dishes from the last customer who sat there. Four stars because the worker actually handed her a wet rag. Wtf who does that?   Then, not too long after that, I experience an angry customer storm out because nobody was at the cash register taking orders. C'mon guys, get it together.

62-mArkQUeqQv2jtKPk3YA.text: Incredibly good. So good. My avocado was a little hard. It that couldn't overcome the rest of what was going on with that waffle sandwich. My new favorite place in Vegas. No Smoke. Woot woot. Had a Red Bull Apple Cider. Shazam!!!  Order it.

mYJaiVAlhp6NiEHJHqeEKw.text: Pretty decent food, but the drinks are awesome. A good selection and all made with the best ingredients and care. The waffles are, just OK. Nothing spectacular, but OK. The chips, meh. I let them be... not really worth it. We tried a couple of things. The Viva Las Elvis was good, but another meh. I loved getting off the strip and trying something a little more local, but with all of the options in Vegas... this just doesn't quite cut it. Go if you want a good Chai Tea or Smoothie. The staff is definitely friendly, but I wouldn't recommend it for a meal.

vpgHTPdQrENGGqHOXRvC5g.text: Walking in you are bombarded with the smell of deliciousness that is waffles. I would go there just to soak in the aroma, it smells that good. Unfortunately, I can't eat the food there because it's not gluten free, so my review is based upon the coffee I got. My friend and I decided to come here because it was a local coffee shop and it wasn't Starbucks. Not a fan of their coffee. Tiabi's coffee selection was pretty good but their waffle selection was better. They had creative coffee drinks like the Jolt and the Snicker's bar which I got. My drink was ok...it a little more on the mocha side than I would've preferred but my friend's drink was amazing. I would definitely go back and get the Jolt next time I'm in Vegas. Definitely check this little coffee shop out. It's got a cool concept going on and who doesn't love waffles?!

9TYKL0ZoVxX3yVo73_YqAg.text: Been here twice, love the smoothies! and the breakfast waffles are great but the best part is you can customize anything and that's really helpful if you are on a certain diet. The staff is super cool and friendly.

Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I call this the Kennia

0VD5i8WF5pt62WdSPQSA7w.text: Wonderful people and excellent food! The perfect option if you're looking for delicious & affordable brunch. I would recommend the west coast if you're looking for a tasty sandwich.

uT2Q254RocqCuKmTQmzRgA.text: I'm such a fan of this place! Quality ingredients that you can taste for a fair price! Everyone that works here is super friendly and upbeat. Try the West Coast sandwich as soon as humanly possible!

sa4RC4P9PwilkdsnSgCawg.text: I am not a vegan but their vegan waffles are so good! And there coffees are creative and delicious. I love going back there!

9o3xC1LDcCa0eHpt1u8fvg.text: This place is cute. It is catered to college crowd. The prices are pretty darn good. I ordered Tiffs special that included a caramel macchiato and small waffle garnish. You can get it iced or hot. It was 4.25! My friend ordered a waffle with chocolate and strawberries and a green smoothie. The waffle was a bit dry and smoothie was very light. But the prices and vibe in here was good enough to try again.

KCYevrwCUVC8LnZ8a-QJuw.text: Best place for coffee !! Better than Starbucks !! Mika and lueck are always awesome sorry but don't really know everyone else's name yet lol I work next to them at Sakana. So I always get big orders from them and they are always awesome and everything I try is always good ! Gingerbread man frappe with expresso is my new favorite must try !!

uSoupO_N9wjt3-AjQYtt7w.text: We were visiting family in Vegas and checked Yelp for a place to go for breakfast. All the good reviews on here made us check it out- and we ended up going twice during our short stay. I had the west coast and a waffle macchiato. My fiance had the golden waffles and a honey cream latte. All of it was amazing! Yes- it took a while to get our food, but they the food is so good that it's worth the wait. We will definitely be back the next time we are in town.

JE9sO8uErwVfbyvz2jRtWQ.text: Fairly inexpensive    quick service  no smiles ever seen though   food is good  coffee is decent   typical local college food place    great deals thru Groupons and living social

gqXZf10UqzZ39iklyEGsUw.text: Only had a blended mocha frappe so far. It was really good and I was really happy that the girl who helped me was willing to use their Ghirardelli Chocolate that they use for baking instead of their normal mocha sauce. It was 10x better and the blend is really smooth

41vRcxtFjj2NBRAQMGhyxQ.text: found this gem via living social.   Break fast waffle (waffle, egg, cheese, bacon).  Simple and yummy.  I can see some people preferring some kind of sauce on this but this was right up my alley... perfect. Ice cream taco waffle (waffle with ice cream, chocolate chips, and nutela drizzle.  Amazing!  I wish I didnt have to share this with the wife. This was probably my favorite place I visited on this Vegas trip that included some much more pricey places.

9Ks84qojn7FgmlbugiZmzw.text: Um the frankestien coffee has five shots of expresso and it made me tired...  It's over priced coffee and I've tried a few flavors for 5$ really isn't worth going there.  It's good to try it once and try a unique coffee.  Waffles are weird

Qg95VyHOVYTkUOaXQlmZmg.text: The West Coast and Kettle Chips are life changing. Love this place. Their juices/smoothies are good too.

MYj1pWjr8pRzgZI7Ji6ZHw.text: My second time here and still impressed ! Had "kisses" waffles with strawberries and bananas with chocolate syrup and vanilla ice cream. Came to visit Las Vegas and had to come here again. My first time was last summer. So yummy . But a tad bit pricey.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ECJPeP8MDyHHJs6jLl9-7Q.text: Really cool they have real freshly made waffles. The works are super polite. Got the breakfast sandwich with beacon and eggs. Too bad the eggs and beacon are industrial made thousands of miles away. They taste and look totally unfresh. Too bad.

Ipz2KmNg-zUq8MrBvvYGKA.text: Been a regular for a couple months because of the great team that runs this place, along with the fresh quality of ingredients they use! Always a pleasure to come here! I usually get the West Coast sandwich! Comes on a waffle or ciabbata

9tt6-Cp648Lmt7mEI2Mr2g.text: I purchased a Groupon in order to give this place a try on my most recent visit to Vegas. I did not get to use all three coupons, but I was able to try this place a few times. The wait can be a bit longer than expected, but the food is rather good. I had a smoothie my first time, which was delicious and filling. The second time, I had a Red Velvet frappe, which was amazing and a sandwich. The sandwich was my least favorite item. I don't know if it was the batter used for the waffle of the sandwich or the fact that it took 20 minutes to be served the sandwich, but I was not pleased. I would recommend this place, especially the Groupon if you plan on being in the area for a few days. I do suggest more staff to accommodate the orders. The same guy who took my order, also made my meal which only made the wait longer

dS4buCnBu6x6qZERLk_TMA.text: If you like candy and everything sweet, then this is a good place for you. Their churro waffles are good, but the coffee-and I've tried multiple different ones-all taste like Bonnie Bell lip balm. They're also insanely overpriced for what they are.

hcdVPDrxBk0NeZGUSjjOrg.text: Best waffles I ever had! Nice and crispy on the outside with a beautiful golden brown color to it, and absolutely delicious fluffy insides~ Just as a waffle should be! Menu is very healthy, me and my boyfriend visited for a small breakfast and it was wonderful! I got a waffle macchiato, which is a splendid coffee toped with whipped cream and a waffle piece on top. The waffle was covered in a cinnamon sugar, so yummy! We also tried some kale chocolate chip cookies, don't be afraid of the color (or kale haha) they were soft and mosit and very delicious! You can't even taste the kale that much~ Great place for waffles or coffee (or both ;D) we will be visiting again to try out more of their menu!

rmScbL00bDxdfVANydAZUA.text: Great savory waffles. A little stingy on the fruits with the paceman. Delicious place overall

iyGpw0LwjN19ku7dip1u5g.text: Great service! They were all very friendly and helpful. Great atmosphere and good prices. Hashtag breakfast sandwich and the hot Mocha latte were very good. Great fresh waffles and coffee!

iN_gjwGFVdrk0MlvBA9DTA.text: I LOVE this place. Absolutely delicious! I had the vegan Elvis waffle and I ate every last bit. I also had a house coffee. The staff is super friendly and you can tell that they truly care about customer satisfaction. Next time I'm in town I am definitely stopping back by. Awesome!

JJ2BSyj86KS3hZe69UdaFg.text: Good breakfast...the waffles are okay, not great but well made...all the items we tried did not disappoint...if you want a change in breakfast this is good alternative...

vl6nUFIpluX-YKkyo1vNnA.text: I love tiabi it's one of my favorite restaurants, the honey I'm home waffle is seriously so good it doesn't even need syrup. All the waffles are incredibly moist and delicious. I wish the prices weren't so high though! Without the groupon I would never go

ER7PWhIkffA4uW1y2G1EoA.text: Hands down my favorite place when I need a carb (waffle) fix.  LOVE the recipe (though they could bring back the almond flavor) and they have vegetarian selections which is great for my friends who follow that lifestyle.  We can all enjoy a day out together.

iqUnE3XmQ4DGko47fOEjnw.text: This place is so cute! I haven't tried the food but the coffee and service is on point! Great music and good vibes here. Perfect place to chill, read, or grab a coffee to go. They also introduced me to Epoxy. Buy 10 coffees get the 11th free!

51aiuqD9rP9uL88VGs7o-A.text: This little waffle bar is adorable. It has a cozy ambiance. It is clean and the staff is friendly (hugely important).   The waffles and sandwiches are warm and light and infused with amazing flavors and unique combinations. They are healthy comfort food stepped up a notch!  Add coffee, tea, smoothies and a laptop or a friend and you've got your morning or afternoon neighborhood place to go if you just want to kick back and you're not in a hurry.   Bravo! Well done Taibi! You get it!

rSYpS5jmWb1fhjx4YMAcwA.text: This place was alright, I liked that they had a vegan option however it was not that great. It had avocado, tomato, and spring lettuce (I think) with their "special sauce". I didn't like the sauce at all, and it just wasn't anything special at all. I think it was around 6 bucks, however I also got their pistachio iced coffee and LOVED that. My friend got a regular waffle which just tasted like a waffle lol & got the peach tea which she said tasted like water but I thought it tasted good. So overall good place if you think waffle sandwiches are cool and you just want to try one but don't expect anything outstanding.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan waffle sandwhich (it was alright), pistachio coffee was awesome

Rzy8i6gJM_MuWMXxR3soHA.text: There's too much to say about this place! I absolutely love it if they were open longer I would be spending more money there than waffles are simply amazing tasty sweet and just hold off we should be they make their own syrup with some funky way and it's delicious always asked for extra encourage them to make bottles to sell. My favorite thing about this place is the black lemonade also known as charcoal lemonade. It's literally black and it's delicious anyone I'm way as I put drive-by I instantly think of them and have to stop so they can try it and they all love it, I wish that they came in different sizes but at this point I'm just glad that I discovered it. It's a must try, must go, must experience!

d3r40JWKSlUH8wVm5Wf8-g.text: The photo says it all, my kids would say "yummy in my tummy" lol great waffle sandwich, great blendie and amazing coconut iced coffee... thumbs up, next time in Vegas will definitely come back! Menu is simple but very yummy. Price is awesome best bang for your buck!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DTVzDnbiYVJJwHXiKcP8ng.text: I've been here a few times now. Trust this picky Vegan...you're in the right place for waffles and coffee drinks. My wife likes the RedBull drink, I think it's called Rebel Punch?. I liked their waffles so much I had to recreate them at home. You can tell they are into the craft, and you have to respect that. I'll be back soon!

m2yTB6UMJrPFNozH3v3bgQ.text: We just moved to Vegas and had picked up a friend in the area. I searched for breakfast places and this place popped up. I'm not a big fan of waffles but the signature coffee drinks looked good. Both coffee's that my husband and I got were amazing and the waffles are Incredible!!! Need to come back with the whole family.

gWGLvMMpkolazph5n2_-yA.text: Came here as a casual meeting with a colleague. It's a small diner type layout with lots of options for waffles and coffee. I liked the decor inside and felt welcomed. I would come here again.   tl;dr: Simple contemporary style. Eat and go, self-serve.

pVKsKXm_xgsSXYcifvi_7g.text: After seeing other great reviews for Tiabi on Yelp, I finally ventured out to check it out! Parking was a bit of a tight squeeze as this location is crammed in with other small businesses next to Target, but the restaurant itself was quiet and laidback.   I decided to try the Red Velvet frappe, which the employees upgraded to a large for me for free because it was my first time! Nice! The frappe was delicious but a little too sweet for me to drink the whole thing.   Now that I know where Tiabi is and have had a good experience with the employees, I definitely want to come back and try the waffles and other drinks.

y88TR5pLLI7SaAApz4ewRw.text: This is probably one of my favorite breakfast spots I have been to in Vegas. The atmosphere is so welcoming and the employees are very friendly. The waffles are amazing and they have so many customizable options. If you're a big coffee fan, like me, you'll love their original coffee creations. I definitely recommend this spot !!

SuzM01EiXfWEmfoHQgxNKg.text: Even though I'm only giving Tiabi 3 stars, I'll be back. Why?  -The prices are fair -the atmosphere is clean, welcoming, and work friendly -the employees are extra helpful -the food is just okay  While the waffle alone is tasty, there's nothing extremely unique about it. And when put in sandwich form, the only unique thing is that it's sandwich stuff....inside a waffle. If you're expecting to be full, you may need to order another menu item as well.   Here's what I've had: -Golden waffle- tasty basic comfort food -Vegan Tiabi Waffle- no difference in taste/texture so also tasty -West Coast Wafflewich- bland and not filling  -Tokyo wafflewich (i think that's what it was called. pretty much chicken, lettuce, and special dressing)- bland and not filling -Avocado Dream Smoothie - not my jam -I had a really delicious Coconut/Lime drink not listed on their menu online  Like I did state before though, the atmosphere is top notch. Everyone is warm, friendly, and very helpful when it comes to making food decisions. The other day I was there to pick up the golden waffle and I was kindly offered syrup, utensils, a back, all with a smile :-D The service definitely makes up for the okay food, and I'll probably just stick to ordering things on the sweeter side as opposed to the savory (bland) sandwiches.

c5xN4PtBFNZ2oDBn8u26pg.text: My constant companion and I decided to try this place after an excursion to Target.  Despite living in the area, and walking as my primary mode of transportation, I hadn't noticed this place before as it is tucked away on the East side of the Target shopping center.  What a delightful find!  This corner of Las Vegas is not known for it's culinary delights, and Tiabi Coffee & Waffle is a gem.  We ordered a nutella, banana, and almond waffle which was delicious, and my constant companion ordered some sort of coffee.  Honestly, I'm not a huge coffee drinker, but my constant companion didn't seem overly awestruck by the coffee.  The waffle was delicious, though, and the waffles at the tables near ours looked equally scrumptious.  I look forward to slowly eating my way through the entire menu in future visits.  I definitely recommend as this as one of the better breakfast places in the immediate area, and the waffles beat any of the waffle/crepe places I've eaten at on the Strip.  Definitely worth moving off the Blvd for a better breakfast meal at a much better price.

V02FX9cSiTNFbW6dRPSgzw.text: I'm very particular when it comes to my coffee. I'm diabetic, so finding sugar free options is really hard. This place makes an good sugar free vanilla iced coffee. West Coast Waffle Sandwich was awesome too. Will be back for more.

jN9AGKt576FGcCIU2qf0Gw.text: This place is amazing! If you're looking for amazing breakfast and lunch this is the place to be! Very trendy and the environment is fun! We're definitely coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. West Coast and Waffle Macchiato!

qG7909FeZDjH8D5MYFyHOw.text: Great service, excellent local coffee and delicious waffle sandwich. Not greasy or heavy, left me full and not feeling like a fat ass. I look forward to coming back again, especially after a recent  terrible breakfast fail at Bruxies (gross!).

sUG66KEzUJ0r7tIGcYl4jg.text: The food here is sooo good! The staff are super friendly as well! This was my go-to spot when I was an undergrad at UNLV. Although a couple of items have changed on the menu over time, there's still a great selection and I'll definitely be back. I'm pretty picky when it comes to how my waffles are cooked and their waffles are cooked perfectly. Also, make sure you try the lavender and white chocolate latte - it's bomb!!

C5yc4Uebjp6pM61IZ1z2OA.text: Very yummy! The vegan waffle is so light and has a great flavor(: I think I had the vegan waffle with the cheese if that's what it's called haha? Don't remember it was really good!

Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan waffle sandwich with cheese

zkDbLU9tHQwoeQGhmEsunw.text: If you're looking for some buttermilk chicken wings and waffles, this is not the place but If you are craving a wholesome vegan made to order waffle with grilled chicken, this place is for you.

OmFlDZOsCC9mTSaoS5p65A.text: Really cool set up inside. I like the vibes it gives off. I got the banutella waffle and I would say it was okay. I would recommend the Elvis one.

c7u7q0kpg4J8hHmJNqe86Q.text: It's a great place. I was sad when they closed the one down in North Las Vegas. I have noticed that the portions have gotten smaller. Especially, their waffles. I mean how much are you really saving by cutting down the batter? I gave them a three because I called for pick-up one morning (in a rush/tired/hungry due to finals and lack of sleep) and I was on hold for five minutes. It gave me enough time to enter the freeway and exit. I hung up and tried calling back and no answer. It was 7 in the morning.. I can't imagine they were swamped with people. I didn't even receive a callback.

jLk8F0GrLhn2UsAJWagRYA.text: It's super cute inside with magazines, games, and good music and the staff was super sweet and helpful. The coffee was sweet but good (got the cupcake latte and the iced dirty mocha chai... The second was too chocolately to be a real chai honestly) But for a healthy place, they had no egg whites! Which to me is silly.  We ordered the white macadamia waffle nut which was good but they put the toppings on top, not inside the batter which would've made it better. The toasty Tokyo was good along with the waffle club.   The groupon and punch cards are a nice touch. Giving it four stars because it's great that a place like this is by UNLV where there are no breakfast places or healthy places.

LJMh9jwIMUg3bzLlBNXMeA.text: There is nothing like the smell of fresh waffles and coffee in Tiabi!!! As soon as I walked in I was engulfed by the smell of butter, sugar, and the smell hot irons. I thought I walking through heaven, this is intense.    These guys have a great list of waffles ranging from sweet to savory. My favorite sweet waffle is the Vivas Las Elvis Bananas, peanut butter, chopped bacon and honey on a Belgian waffle. Vegan version-sub bacon and honey for almonds and agave.  I believe the place stands out for the Wafflewiches.   The West Coast wafflewich is chicken, tomato, avocado and bacon in between a toasted waffle. The lightly crunch with the saltiness of the chicken and bacon combination is over the top. Definitely something you must try!  On top of that they make fabulous coffee too, complements the food. They carry all types of coffee you would expect with few specialties the one I'm eager to try is Tiff's Waffle Machiato; Cinnamon vanilla latte, whipped cream and caramel sauce and served with a churronimo waffle on top.   The customer service there outstanding!!  Mae is a delightful person and shes cool to have conversation with. I was fortunate to have similar food interests with her as far as finding new things in town to eat.   I'll definitely be going back!!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry Kisses!!
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vivas Las Elvis: Peanut Butter, Banana and Bacon.
Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The WestCoast Wafflewich

2jvFMaM4A7ZoZLZCYNWInw.text: Friendly staff and delicious waffles! Had the red velvet waffle and West Coast wafflewhich. Both were delicious. Tender chicken on the west coast and just the right amount of sweetness from the red velvet waffle

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pzTn8R3IlGAndewausPQsw.text: Bookmarked to try this place for brunch, and I managed to go here this past Friday with the Mom and Sister. They were hesitant 'cause they hadn't been here before and were expecting to to one of our usual brunch places, but they ended up being extremely happy with the experience. Customer service was awesome. After greeting us, the cashier noticed that we were probably new to the place, so he told us a little about the ordering process and menu (regular items, faves, and seasonal specials). Pretty chill and nice guy.  The sister ordered the Halloween-themed menu for a waffle and a cold latte. Mom ordered a Halloween-themed hot latte with a West Coast Wafflewich. I ordered a cold Chocolate Coconut with a West Coast Wafflewich. Hahaha... The sister liked her waffle and her drink, but she wished she had ordered the same wafflewich as us. It had a pretty amazing sauce, and the ingredients tasted as fresh as can be. I will admit that I wish I had their latte though. Don't get me wrong 'cause I liked my drink, but I tasted more chocolate than coconut, and I'm looking for a balance.  The cashier also kept making sure we were okay as I got the food whenever it was ready to be picked up from the counter. He also happened to be the busperson, nice enough to pick up after us when we were done. Sorry sir... I'll be sure to put our stuff in the bucket thing on the side when we're done. Thanks though!

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. West Coast Wafflewich  It was scrumptious

XmoZtPfzTlALXqNiYEzVpQ.text: Great place for waffles and coffee Definitely have to go with the waffledilla Yummy flavor Convenient location Got the iced coffee

The ambiance and the workers were both very nice. I am impressed with this place :) this waffle is amazing. Best waffle I have had since I've been vegan.

zho8IN0wv78NyTz0smw9ZA.text: All the things I love: coffee, tea, and waffles!! Once you walk in, you immediately know that you're in for a great experience. With everything prepared to order, the food and drinks are fresh and high quality.   They have a very interesting coffee menu with things like red velvet lattes. The flavors offered are rich and well executed.   This has a small cafe environment with open seating for all people. The clean and friendly environment makes for a great meeting or work space. Free Wi-Fi is offered for your internet needs.

2FmKlEjYAbhB0XKB4GljfQ.text: I stumbled across this place early in the morning & might I say I'm pleased I did the breakfast is amazing I ordered two waffles one for me and one for my boyfriend I didn't eat mines so my boyfriend added ice cream to it overall he said it was good I got the waffle sandwich eggs avocado tomato it was delicious just wish they had some type of sauce to add to it imagine eating a breakfast sandwich with no sauce just dry the food here is great but the wait time various i waited over an hour for a sandwich one time & the restaurant wasn't packed so give yourself some time when here

9fhLZALruPyVoYOtRV7k5g.text: I came here for a meet up with friends and hour both a waffle sandwich and a desert waffle. The sandwich (cali one) was tasty as can be. It had a great chipotle style sauce. It truly stole the show. However, my desert waffle (kisses)looked 10 times better than it tasted. The waffle was way too crunchy.   Needless to say, my overall experience was fantastic. I had very little wait time to receive my food. The staff was nice and always smiling. The place was clean, cute, and comfortable. It really wasnt with complaining about the overcooked waffle because at that point I was pretty full. To full to eat a perfect one.  Definitely go check this place out if you are a Lesley Knope!

Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $0.50 cents of pure happiness

UAc7f-8ySlRtwZ_6yZnhqA.text: BY FAR MY FAVORITE FOOD SPOT IN LAS VEGAS!  The food, drinks & service are AMAZE BALLS! lol. Saw that there was a Groupon but we wanted to try it out first. We ended up buying the Groupon because we knew we would be back for the remainder of our stay :)  You walk in & the menu is to the left.  I love how it's set up, cafe & you can see them making the food. They take your order & ask for your name (they will call you name when your order is ready)  The FOODS: - Lemonade: So yummy! Sweet, just how I like it! - Tiff's Waffle Macchiato: THE BEST DRINK EVERRRR! lol. It comes with a waffle that is dusted with cinnamon sugar, it's messy but worth the mess. So yummers! - Pac-Man Waffle: Exactly what it sounds like. Pac-Man shaped waffle with blueberries & raspberries as the thing that Pac-Man eats. Lol. Super cute! - Vegan Wafflewich: Tomato, spring mix, avocado & Tiabi sauce toasted. Pretty much like a salad in a waffle, sandwich styled. Sooooo good! I ordered this with the Macchiato every time I went here.  The employees are AMAZING! They remembered us & they're super friendly.  I totally recommend this place, RECOMMEND, RECOMMEND! You will not be disappointed!

MKLkUUgP_fOkpvg8H9yRow.text: Service: Everyone that I've encountered that works here makes you feel good. They're smiling, genuine, often funny, and it always feels like they really like their product as much as we do. The only downside: weekend mornings, like many breakfast spots, get busy, so service slows down a little and seating can be difficult to find if you're a group of 2+  Food: I've yet to have anything that I am not pleased with. My favorite is the churro waffle with ice cream (breakfast of champions, obviously), but even a plain golden waffle is pretty great. Simple, but quality taste. It's even better that they have options for dairy-sensitive peeps, and all your vegan friends.

N5tvZwEFEyDKKpPczDlh5g.text: Met up with a group of friends on a Saturday morning around 11 am. The place was packed and it is a little on the small side. We were lucky to get a table by the front door. The menu is impressive with a lot of options. You can have breakfast or lunch, I opted for breakfast. I had the Viva Las Elvis waffle (peanut butter, bacon, bananas, and honey) and it was pretty good although I could of done without the bananas and I added maple syrup. Others in the group seemed to enjoy their meals. Due to the small size of the place and how popular it seems I did notice that there were several people who came in but left because of the lack of seats. I am not sure if I would come back again just because of the location. It is a little farther than I would drive just to have a waffle but if I was in the area I would go back.

photos.caption: Photo of TIABI Coffee & Waffle Bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Viva Las Elvis

mS4xlpa-ztxU6a5obkI1cQ.text: The golden waffle was okay as was the Strawberry Sunrise. No major kudos are due; they made a vegan waffle that was decent but not at all thrilling.

hylB3G1Tk_tcLVIsrTDzGg.text: One of the best places in town, whether you are looking for traditional breakfast waffles, or an original place to go for lunch TIABI has it covered. The atmosphere and service are top notch, and the food is excellent.

NJQNn69T2R5HbnB0QElKdg.text: BEST PLACE EVER! Crave the west coast for days!! The waffle macchiato is amazing! Tiabi is so wonderful and a great vibe. Wish they stayed open later!

Unbelievable good Iced Coffee, I had the Coconut Truffle Iced Coffee. Ordered the Breakfast Sandwich and Strawberry Kisses waffle... we ate it so fast we forgot to take pictures of it!!! Get here NOW.

Lxh5Hr2AtlOFmal0CpS5Rw.text: It was great!!! Very accommodating to my vegan needs!! And my boyfriends non vegan needs! :) it's a shame it's so far away from me and not in the greatest part of town! But don't let that scare you away! It was top notch quick breakfast!

fzMy39kFp1qGzJZiC6KacQ.text: Not recommended. Tables are sticky from the syrup. Waffles are burned. Also, a nice lady came in when we were here and had a small cup in her hand. She asked for a little bit of ice. The woman working declined with a statement to the affect of "we don't give things away for free, you have to buy something". 100 degrees outside and you won't share a little ice. Not for me

YnOjrVntjWIyahTd_zartw.text: Excellent food & service. I will definitely be back. Lots of Vegan options and super friendly staff.

kqk7d6cyrWNpTGtOM8Ny2w.text: My Vegas family and I met here when we were visiting Las Vegas. Great,simple delicious food! It's like breakfast sandwiches,but served on waffles! The coffee's wonderful too! The staff were very friendly and accommodating. We had a group of seven adults and two children,and no reservations,as none of us made them!They let us sit at a large table that another group had reserved.(Some of that party had an emergency;and it was ok with the half of the group that was there.) Some of us waited a bit to get our food,but I didn't mind, as we were visiting.Our family was there for two hours!-I'm surprised they didn't ask us to leave?! The staff was just so nice!

v12bcmGMvKC8XJwTq6dvUg.text: I wanted to pick up some morning macchiatos, so my friend suggested I try out Tiabi. I was greeted by the friendly cashier who was open to answering all of my first time client questions. I ordered two regular caramel macchiatos and also received a macadamia/caramel Lolly waffle for checking in. The macchiatos barely had a caramel taste, but did showcase the fresh coffee it was made with. Definitely better quality and more refreshing than any chain coffee shop. The Lolly waffle was satisfying but had an awful amaretto after taste and was undercooked in the center. If they gave their waffle maker a good scrubbin' and ditched the almond tang, I think the lolly waffle could have a chance to be great. Overall, the customer service was friendly and coffee was tasty, but the lolly waffle and cleanliness of the establishment need improvement.

mHep0vssHaBXp2bm0N4bAQ.text: Really really good! They definitely should put more chicken on the wafflewhiches though. I indeed recommend the Waffle Macciato or whatever they call it, it's killer!

0SuhwNBxe78A-5BXykoi5g.text: Ok let me start off by saying i absolutely love this place super offbeat in the best possible way, the quirky decor and i love the huge chalk wall the message is totes me. Right away when you step into the doors you feel relaxed and welcomed. Between the chill atmosphere friendly staff you never want to leave, bonus they have playing cards on the table to entice you to stay a while. Perfect for an after work chill spot or rejuvenate after a long day of shopping!  The prices for the portions are redonculous! Averaging about $6 buck. I got the Banatella Belgium waffle and i know you can see my face but its covered in drool! the waffle is crispy on the outside and fluffy warm goodness on the inside i had mine topped with a scoop of Thriftys (yes i said Thriftys) ice cream and my waffle stood up to the scoop the bananas, delicious Nutella drizzle and almond slivers without ever getting mushy! My friend got her own creation (she's a bit of a mad scientist) She had the traditional waffle with chocolate chips, strawberries and caramel and she had no complaints. I will definitely be back hope to see you there!
